GSP33nysu__2u:5: siddhaye prathamādhyāyārthasaṅgatatvena dvitīyādhyāyārthaṃ vivakṣurabuddhisthena saṅgaterdarśayitumaśakyatvāt prathamādhyāyārthaṃ tāvadanuvadati- ukta iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:9: pare brahmaṇi nārāyaṇe svaravarṇapadavākyamahāvākyarūpasya samastasya śāstrasya,

GSP33nysu__2u:17: evaṃ prathamādhyāyārthamabhidhāya tatsaṅgatatvena dvitīyādhyāyārthamāha- avirodha iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:20: atrokte 'rthe 'virodho virodhābhāvo 'tra vyācikhyāsitatayā buddhisannihite dvitīye('dhyāye) sādhyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:23: sakalaśāstrasya samanvayena jagajjanmādikāraṇatve samastagurapūrṇatve 'śeṣadoṣavidhuratve ca parasya brahmaṇo 'bhihita eva(hi)
GSP33nysu__2u:29: athavā śrutisamanvayenopapādito 'pyartho na tāvacchrotṝṇāṃ dṛḍhanirūḍho bhavati,
GSP33nysu__2u:55: tasya caturvidhasyāpi virodhābhāvasya madhye yuktivirodhābhāvaḥ prathamapāde sādhyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:56: sarveṣāmapi virodhānāṃ yuktyupajīvitavena tadvirodhasya prabalatayā tadabhāvasādhanasya prāthamyopapatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:57: yuktipuraskāreṇa yuktyupajīvitvena tadvirodhasya prabalatayā tadabhāvasādhanasya prāthamyopapatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:69: tathāca virodhasya yuktyādyupadhānena caturvidhatvāttadabhāvasādhanena pādabhedo yujyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:70: caturvidhasya tasya virodhasya madhye yaukto virodha ādāvuktaprakāreṇa prabalo yatastasmāttadabhāvo 'trādau sādhyata iti yojanīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:78: caturvidhasyāpi tasya virodhino madhye yukteḥ prabalatvādādau yaukto yuktisambandhī virodhābhāvaḥ sādhyata iti yojyam / *5,20*
GSP33nysu__2u:86: yadyapi smṛterityasya na nañarthena sambandho ghaṭate virodhaśca samāse guṇabhūtaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:87: tathāpi buddhayā viviktena tena sambandhaḥ sambhavati / *5,22*
GSP33nysu__2u:89: kartavyatāyāṃ vā prāthamyaṃ kuta ityata āha- tasyā iti //

GSP33nysu__2u:99: prathamātikrame ca kāraṇaṃ na kiñcidastītyādyādhikaraṇe nirūpyata iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:100: evañca tatrāpi ca smṛterityayamuktasyāpavādo bhavannapi na sarvathetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:103: prasaṅgacchiṣyāṇāṃ śāstre bahumānotpādanāyānyadapi cāturvidhyaṃ vakti- pratyekamiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:107: catvāro 'pi pādāḥ pratyekaṃ caturātmakāḥ pādacatuṣyayārthavanto draṣṭavyāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:117: kintu tadaṃśāśca te pādā aṃśā yeṣāṃ te tadaṃśā adhyāyā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:122: yadā prathamaḥ samanvayasyārtho vivakṣyate na tadā tadarthatetareṣāmityādi / *5,24*
GSP33nysu__2u:126: catasṛṇāṃ vāsudevādimūrtīnāṃ pratipādakatvenāpi caturātmakatvaṃ jñātavyamiti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__2u:134: na kevalaṃ pratyakṣaraṃ pratipadaṃ pratisūtraṃ pratyadhikaraṇaṃ kintvetacchāstragatamekaṃ varṇamārabhya ā sarvaśāstrāt,
GSP33nysu__2u:135: pratyadhikaraṇaṃ pratipādaṃ pratyādhyāyaṃ samastena śāstreṇa ca catasro mūrtayaḥ pratipādyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:142: etā eva tvatibalā siddhāntasya niyāmakāḥ // MAnuv_2,1.4 //
GSP33nysu__2u:144: uktārthaṃ smṛtivirodhenākṣipya samādadhatsūtram oṃ smṛtyanavakāśadoṣaprasaṅga iti cennānyasmṛtyanavakāśadoṣaprasaṅgāt oṃ //
GSP33nysu__2u:147: yaduktaṃ parasya brahmaṇo viṣṇoḥ sakalajagajjanmādikāraṇatvaṃ sārvajñyādisakalaguṇapūrṇatvaṃ samastadoṣadūratvaṃ ca tadayuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:150: naca tāsāmanyo 'vakāśo 'sti yena pratīte 'pyarthe tātparyābhāvaṃ pratīmaḥ /

GSP33nysu__2u:168: sāmyāpādanamātre 'pi parasyaiva jayo niścayapratibandhakatvādityato nirdalaṃ pūrvapakṣa tāvadujjīvayati- āptairiti // *5,27*
GSP33nysu__2u:170: āptaiḥ pratyakṣato dṛṣṭvā proktamarthaṃ kathaṃ śratiḥ /

GSP33nysu__2u:196: śrutimūlatayābhimatā hi tāḥ smṛtayo 'tastāsāṃ mūlaśrutyanumāpakatvena prāmāṇyamiṣyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:198: yathā'ha jaiminiḥ“virodhe tvanapekṣaṃ syādasati hyanumānam'; iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:215: kintu sahajasiddhena yogardhilabdhena vā pratyakṣeṇāśeṣārthadarśināmāptānāṃ vacanamanusṛtya netavyāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:220: tadidamuktaṃ pipīlikālipinibhā saṃvādena vinā kamapyarthaṃ pratipādayitumasamarthā śrutiryadvacanasaṃvādāpekṣiṇī tairevāptaiḥ pratyakṣato dṛṣṭvā proktamarthaṃ kathaṃ vārayet /
GSP33nysu__2u:226: tadeva kuta ityata āha- sarvagā hīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:236: tathāca teṣāṃ mohābhāvena rāgadveṣayorapyabhāvāt vipralipsā ca nivartate /
GSP33nysu__2u:240: icchāpi pratipipādayiṣā vā vipralipsā veti sandeho 'vaśiṣyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:241: tatrābhyāsadaśāpanno 'yamartho 'syeti sāmānyato niścaye bhavatyeva tasya jñānasya
GSP33nysu__2u:244: vipralipsā ca hetudarśanena vyāptā hetau sati syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:247: na tāvatpāntheṣu vimārgeṇa pratiṣṭhamāneṣu mleñchānāṃ kaścitsvopakāraḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:256: anabhyāsadaśāpanne tu viṣaye pramāṇāntarasaṃvādātpravṛttisāmarthyādvā mohavipralipsayornivṛttirityato mleñchā apyāptā bhavanti /
GSP33nysu__2u:269: nanu viruddhayoḥ pramāṇayoḥ sāmye sati satpratipakṣatā syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:280: ... mānaṃ hy ubhayatra samaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_2,1.6cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:283: yasmādevaṃ tasmādubhayatra pūrvapakṣasiddhāntayormānaṃ smṛtidvayaṃ samaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__2u:284: tathā ca pāśupatādismṛtīnāṃ satpratipakṣatvaṃ sthitamiti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:285: nanu ye viruddhe pramāṇe na tayoḥ sāmyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:292: ubhayatra dvayossmaraṇayormadhye yatsamaṃ saha mayā mūlapramāṇena vartate,
GSP33nysu__2u:300: tathobhayatra smaraṇe yatpañcarātrādismaraṇaṃ samaṃ samūlapramāṇaṃ saṃvādipamāṇāntaropetaṃ ca,
GSP33nysu__2u:306: yāvatā paśupatiprabhṛtīnāmāptistatra mūlamuditetyata āha- na ceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:321: athocyeta sarvajñānāṃ mohābhāvāttanmūlayo rāgadveṣayorabhāve vipralipsāpi nivartata ityāptiniścaya iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:322: kiṃ tatra sarve 'pi tīrthakarā āptā ityaṅgīkṛtyaivamanumīyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:334: naca tatra sāvarjñyaṃ nāṅgīkriyata iti yuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:343: abhyāsadaśāpanno 'yam artho 'syeti sāmānyaniścaye sati tatsiddhiriti netyāha- vyabhicārata iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:348: tāsu tāsu smṛtiṣvabhiniviṣyāḥ sarve 'pi hi taṃ tamācāryaṃ tatra tatrārthe 'bhyāsavantamevācakṣate /
GSP33nysu__2u:356: asya niyamasya buddhādiṣu bhagnatvādityāha- vyabhicarata iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:360: nahi tattatpuruṣaviśeṣānusaṃhitāste te prayojanaviśeṣāḥ piśitanayanairasmadādibhiravadhārayituṃ śakyanta ityāśayenāha- vyabhicārata iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:370: atha viśvahitopadeśārthaṃ pravṛttyā vipralambhābhāvo 'numīyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:382: camatkāraṃ mā tvariṣṭhā ityāśayenāha- vyabhicārata iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:383: athāgamaḥ sa kiṃ vedādiruta tadviruddhaṃ smṛtyantaramathavā svayūthyaracitaṃ granthāntaram /
GSP33nysu__2u:402: tasya bauddhādiviṣaye 'pi vidyamānatvena vyabhicārādityāha- vyabhicārata iti // *5,53*
GSP33nysu__2u:413: na hyekatrāptena sarvatrāpi tathā bhāvyamiti niyamo 'sti /
GSP33nysu__2u:420: kiñca phalavyabhicāratastadaṃśasyānāptimūlatvasthitau paśupatipraṇītatvādestatra vyabhicārataḥ kathamanumānaṃ syādityāha- vyabhicārata iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:431: nacāsyā vyabhicāre 'pi hīyate mānatā kvacit // MAnuv_2,1.7cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:438: yataḥ phalavyabhicāre hetau kvacid dṛṣṭārthāyāṃ vartamāne asyā adṛṣṭārthāyāṃ phalavyabhicāre,
GSP33nysu__2u:439: tata evāprāmāṇye satyapyasyā adṛṣṭārthāyāstāvavanmānatā na hīyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:443: atha dṛṣṭārthāyāḥ phalavyabhicāreṇāprāmāṇye sati tata evādṛṣṭārthā apyapramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:444: tata iti kiṃ tena hetunota tena dṛṣṭāntena /
GSP33nysu__2u:455: dṛṣṭārthāyāṃ phalavyabhicāre aprāmāṇye ca satyasyā api mānatā śaṅkāspadatvena hīyata iti ca na vācyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:459: nirdoṣavākyaṃ vedaḥ tadyuktiḥ samarthapravṛttijanakatvaṃ prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇasya yata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:462: tata evetarasyā apyaprāmāṇyaśaṅkanaṃ ca svātantryeṇa kriyate kiṃvā pratibandīgrahaṇam /
GSP33nysu__2u:467: pareṇa khalu phalasaṃvādādinā pāśupatādismṛterāptimūlatvaprāmāṇyayoranumitayorasmābhistannyāyena phalavisaṃvādaṃ pradarśya doṣo 'bhihitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:471: na caivaṃ tatprāmāṇyāvadhāraṇaṃ nirmūlaṃ syāditi vācyam /

GSP33nysu__2u:477: bodhakatvenaiva hi prāmāṇyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ tacca vākyatvācchaterubhayasammatam /
GSP33nysu__2u:479: na cāpauruṣeye sa sambhavatīti niṣkampameva śrutiprāmāṇyamiti vakṣyāma ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:482: iti tattathā kintvaviruddhānāmevopāyatvaṃ na tu viruddhānām /
GSP33nysu__2u:485: nanu ca pañcarātrādismṛtīnāṃ prāmāṇyamaṅgīkurvāṇaiḥ sarvathā pravṛttisāmarthyamaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:487: anyathā phalavyabhicāri ca pramāṇaṃ ceti vyāghātāpātāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:489: naca tadyuktimūlateti suhṛdbhāvena pṛcchantaṃ pratyāha- vedoktasyeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:491: niyamo vyabhicāro vā naiva jñātuṃ hi śakyate // MAnuv_2,1.8 //
GSP33nysu__2u:493: vaidikagranthopadiṣyānuṣṭhāne vedoktā niṣekādisaṃskārā evādhikāratāmāpadyanta iti vedoktasyetyuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:498: sadeti svabhāvata eva na tu deśādivyavadhānenetyarthaḥ /

GSP33nysu__2u:520: tathā ca yatra phalaṃ nopalabdhaṃ tatrādhikārādivaiguṇyamitaratra tu tatsādguṇyamityato niyamaniścaya iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:527: tathācāsya phalaniyama eva vyabhicārastu vaiguṇyanimitta iti vāstu /
GSP33nysu__2u:529: kvacitphalopalambhastu kākatālīyo 'nyanimitta eveti vā bhavatviti sandeho na nivartate /
GSP33nysu__2u:532: vedasaṃvādena tu prāmāṇye 'vadhārite śakyate phalavyabhicārasyānyā gatiḥ kalpayitum /
GSP33nysu__2u:533: ato vedasaṃvādenaiva prāmāṇyaṃ pañcarātrādīnāmavadhāryate na pravṛttisāmarthyeneti / *5,67*
GSP33nysu__2u:536: yathā ca pañcarātrādiprāmāṇyamabhilaṣatā phalavyabhicārasyādhikārādivaikalyanibandhanatā kalpyā tathāhamapi pāśupatādismṛtiṣu kalpayiṣyāmīti,
GSP33nysu__2u:539: vedokto hy adhikārastu durlabhaḥ sarvamānuṣaiḥ // MAnuv_2,1.9 //
GSP33nysu__2u:548: nanu kathamanyāgameṣvadhikāraḥ sādhanaṃ ca sulabhamuktamityato leśena daśaryati- anyāgameṣviti //
GSP33nysu__2u:552: yadbhāvāḥ tareṇa mahatā tapasā vinā vā(na)
GSP33nysu__2u:556: viprā eva ye kamarṇā caṇḍālāsteṣāṃ kathañcitpratyāpattirvaidikairapyaṅgīkriyata ityataścaṇḍālajanmanāmityuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:562: caramamaṇḍalapraveśe tu vipraḥ sampadyata ityanyāgameṣu pratipādyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:572: karṇikā rucakaṃ caiva kuṇḍalaṃ ca śikhāmaṇiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:574: ābhirmudritadehastu na bhūya iha jāyate (kāyabhāk)'; ityādi /
GSP33nysu__2u:576: rudrākṣakaṅkaṇaṃ haste jaṭā caikā ca mastake /
GSP33nysu__2u:579: nanu yathādhikārasādhanayoḥ saulabhyamuktamevaṃ taddaurlabhyamapi tatraivoktamiti cettarhi na kevalaṃ phalasaṃvādena pāśupatādīnāmaprāmāṇyam
GSP33nysu__2u:583: ucyate 'tastaduktaṃ hi vyabhicāri phale 'pi tu // MAnuv_2,1.11 //
GSP33nysu__2u:589: yasmācca taduktaṃ sādhanaṃ phale 'pi viṣaye vyabhicāri atastaduktaṃ sā pāśupatādyuktiḥ kathaṃ pramāṇatāṃ gacchenna kathamapītyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:591: tathāca phalavisaṃvādo 'pyadhikārādivaiguṇyanimitto bhaviṣyati yathā pañcarātrādāviti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:596: kvacitsaṃvādastu kākatālīyo vā guḍajihvikānimitto vā bhaviṣyati /
GSP33nysu__2u:599: tadevaṃ pāśupatādīnāmapasmṛtitvānna tadvirodhenoktārthāsambhavaḥ śaṅkanīya iti sthitam /
GSP33nysu__2u:603: // oṃ na vilakṣaṇatvādasya tathātvaṃ ca śabdāt oṃ //
GSP33nysu__2u:621: dṛśī daśā tadā kā vātasmṛtītihāsapurāṇānāṃ phalavyabhicārādi(doṣa)
GSP33nysu__2u:623: tathāca vedādisamanvayena na jagajjanmādikāraṇatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ siddhayatītyevaṃ prāpte tatpratividhānātharsya na vilakṣaṇatvāditi sūtrasya tātparyamāha- nityatvāditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:624: na vilakṣaṇatvād asya tathātvaṃ ca śabdāt / BBs_2,1.4 /
GSP33nysu__2u:626: ujkhitaṃ sarvadoṣaiśca kathaṃ no mānatāṃ vrajet // MAnuv_2,1.12c-d //
GSP33nysu__2u:634: vākye ca prāmāṇyasyāpavādakā doṣā abodhakatvaviparītabodhakatvādayaḥsarve 'pi vaktṛdoṣanibandhanā eva /
GSP33nysu__2u:636: vedavākyaṃ ca nityatvādapauruṣeyatvātpuruṣadoṣanibandhanaiḥ sarvadoṣairvarjitaṃ svata eva prāmāṇyamāpnoti /
GSP33nysu__2u:637: prāmāṇye ca niścite sati phalavyabhicārasya sāmagrīvaikalyaṃ vā pratibandhakasadbhāvo vā kāraṇaṃ kalpayiṣyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:648: ye tu svayūthyā vedaprāmāṇyamaṅgīkṛtyāpi tannityatāṃ nānumanyante tānprati sūtrasūcitābhiḥ śrutibhistāmupapādayati- virūpeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:656: tadapi bahukālīnatvaṃ bhaviṣyatītyato“nityayānityayā staumi brahma tatparamaṃ padam';
GSP33nysu__2u:657: iti“śrutirvāva nityānityā vāva smṛtayo yāścanyā vācaḥ';
GSP33nysu__2u:663: vākyaśeṣe hi bahukālīnā api smṛtīranityapakṣe nikṣipya śrutimeva nityāmāha /
GSP33nysu__2u:665: āptoktatvasya duravadhāraṇatāyāḥ prāguktatvena pauruṣeyatve prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇānupapattiprasaṅgena durbalatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:666: prāmāṇyasya svatastvenāpauruṣeyatve 'pi kāraṇābhāvātprāmāṇyaṃ na syāditi prasaṅgasyābhāsatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:680: aprāmāṇyaṃ khalu pipīlikāliperabodhakatvena vā syādviparītabodhakatvena vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:696: tacca lekhakabuddhisthaśabdaviṣayaṃ vā tadavabuddhārthaviṣayaṃ vā syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:703: kiñcetaratrāpyanumāne kimeḍamūkavyāvṛttyarthaṃ kimapi viśeṣaṇamupādeyamuta neti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:710: atha mūlalekhakabuddhisthaśabdārthānumāne na ko 'pi doṣa iti matam /
GSP33nysu__2u:714: nahi pipīlikālipeḥ puruṣaliperasti kaścidviśeṣo yena neyaṃ pipīlikālipiriti niścinuyāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:722: lipidarśanādikaṃ tu saṃskāro dvedhābhidhasahakārisampādanenaiva caritārthamiti kathaṃ tasya prāmāṇyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:726: tathāca cakṣuṣa ivārthopasarpaṇatatsaṃyogasahitasya prāmāṇyamevaṃ lipidarśanatadudbuddhasaṃskārasahitasyaiva manasa iti kathaṃ na lipeḥ prāmāṇyam
GSP33nysu__2u:729: nanvatra pramāṇaśabdo bhāvasādhano vā syātkāraṇasādhano vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:730: ādye pipīlikālipiḥ pramāṇamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:738: nanu ca śruteḥ samyaganubhavasādhanatvena prāmāṇyamiṣyaṃ natu smārakatvena /
GSP33nysu__2u:739: tathāca na śrutiḥ samyaganubhavasādhanabuddhipūrvakatvātpipīlikālipivadityanumāsyata ityata āha- yatheti //
GSP33nysu__2u:743: yathābuddhipūrvakamapyekenolūkena kṛtamanekakākanāśanamaśvatthāmno 'hameka evānekānvadhiṣyāmītyasyārthasya bodhakaṃ samyaganubhavaṃ prati sādhanaṃ jātam /
GSP33nysu__2u:747: sāditve 'pi buddhijanyatvābhāvo vā pratipādyātharbuddhipūrvakatvābhāvo vānenaitadevaṃ pratipādayiṣyāmītyabhisandhipūrvakatāvaidhuryaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:758: anumānamātre suvaco 'pi cetanavyāpāraviṣayasya tathābhūta eva śākune pradarśayitumucita iti na pradarśitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:761: yattu pramāṇāviruddhaṃ tadvayabhicārasthalaṃ bhaviṣyatīti bhāvenoktam- aviruddhamiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:765: vibhaktipratirūpakaṃ cāvyayaṃ bhavatīti vacanādavyayametaditi na doṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:775: na conmattavākyamapi pramāṇaṃ pramāṇaviruddhatvādityata āha- viruddhaṃ tviti //
GSP33nysu__2u:778: pramāṇaviruddhaṃ yadunmattavākyaṃ tat pramāṇavirodhādeva bādhitamayathārthamiti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__2u:795: nanvasyopādheryadayathārthaṃ tatpramāṇaviruddhamiti sādhyavyāpakatve 'pi sādhanāvyāpakatvaṃ kathamityata āha- virodheti //
GSP33nysu__2u:810: yadvā vedo yathārtho bodhakatve sati pramāṇāviruddhatvātpratyakṣavat /
GSP33nysu__2u:813: evaṃ vākyatvāvacchinne sādhye 'nāptapraṇītatvamupādhistadviparyayeṇa ca pratipakṣo 'bhidheya iti / *5,103*
GSP33nysu__2u:817: yena prāmāṇyamavadhārya phalavyabhicāramanyathā neṣyāma ityata āha- tanmūlatvāditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:824: tathāpi tamanusṛtya racitatvaṃ tanmūlatvamiha vivakṣitamiti noktadoṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:832: sati caivaṃ smṛtīnāṃ prāmāṇye tadbalena phalavyabhicāro 'pyanyathayitavya iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:834: teṣāṃ prāmāṇyasādhane ca bahuviplavaḥ syādityata āha- virodha iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:838: yāsāṃ smṛtīnāṃ sarvathā pramāṇavirodho nāsti tāsāmeva pakṣīkaraṇānna kaściddoṣa ityāśayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:843: vedamūlatvena tu prāmāṇye siddhe na ko 'pi doṣa iti / *5,107*
GSP33nysu__2u:850: virodho 'pi sa evoktaḥ pratyakṣeṇāgamena vā // MAnuv_2,1.16cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:854: virodhādeva bādhitamityaprāmāṇyaprayojakatayokto virodho 'pi sa eva yaḥ pratyakṣeṇāgamena vā syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:857: aprāmāṇyaprayojakatayā yadasmābhirabhihitaṃ tatpakṣe 'pyupapādayituṃ khalu parasyāyaṃ prayatnaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:861: nanu pramāṇavirodha evāprāmāṇye prayojako 'stu kiṃ pratyakṣeṇāgamena veti viśeṣaṇena /
GSP33nysu__2u:864: vakṣyāmo hyatra brahmādivastuṣu pramāṇaṃ veda evaika iti vaidike 'rthe 'numānasyānavakāśam /
GSP33nysu__2u:865: yatra ca yasyāpraveśo na tasya tadbādhakam /
GSP33nysu__2u:871: tarhi vedārthamīmāṃsā nārambhaṇīyā syāt mīmāṃsāyā yuktyanusandhānātmakatavādityata āha- āgameneti //
GSP33nysu__2u:878: naca dharmyādirūpaṃ brahmādikaṃ vedādṛte siddhayatīti tadanapekṣāyāmāśrayāsiddhayādikam,
GSP33nysu__2u:879: apekṣāyāṃ tu virodhino dharmyādigrāhakavirodha ityevaṃ vaidike 'rthe 'numānasyānavakāśo 'bhidhistitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:880: mīmāṃsāyāṃ tu kvacidāgamasyāgamāntareṇa virodha evārthanirṇayārthaṃ yuktirupādīyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:890: api ca pratyakṣāgamavirodho 'pi na svarūpeṇāprāmāṇyaṃ prayojayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:891: kintu tayorupajīvyatvādinā prābalye satyeva durbalayoḥ svayaṃ bādhitatvena samabalayoḥ pratibandhamātrahetutvenāprāmāṇyaniścayānupapatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:904: ataśca na tadvirodhena vedasyāprāmāṇyaṃ mantavyamityāśayenāha- pratyakṣamiti // *5,111*
GSP33nysu__2u:913: ityādivedaṃ prati niraniṣyo niravadya ityādestasya vedo(dasyo)
GSP33nysu__2u:915: evaṃ niravakāśatvādikamapi pratyakṣāgamayoreva prāyeṇa sambhavati yuktestu kvacideva /
GSP33nysu__2u:920: nahi sarvatrāgamayoḥ parasparavirodha eva mīmāṃsāvatāryata ityata āha- yukta iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:926: tathāpi yatra naivaṃ tatraikasyaivāgamasyānekārthapratītau yuktyanusāriṇamarthamupādāya tadanuguṇatadviruddhārthaparityāgaḥ kriyata iti noktaniyamabhaṅgaḥ
GSP33nysu__2u:935: yadvā yatsiddhavatkṛtya tatra mīmāṃsārambhānupapattiḥ parihṛtā tadidānīṃ darśayitumāha- yuktiśceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:938: vyāptiḥ pratyakṣatā yasyā yuktigā'gamagā tathā // MAnuv_2,1.20ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:940: yasyā yukteḥ sādhyena vyāptiḥ pratyakṣagā pratyakṣāvagatā saikā /
GSP33nysu__2u:941: yuktigā yuktyavagatā yasyā vyāptiḥ sā dvitīyā /
GSP33nysu__2u:942: tathā'gamagā āgamāvagatā yasyā vyāptiḥ sā tṛtīyeti /
GSP33nysu__2u:947: evaṃ tarhi yā yuktimūlā yuktiḥ sā nāgamādyupajīvinīti tasya bādhikā /
GSP33nysu__2u:956: tathāca pratyakṣādyapekṣatvena sāmye 'pi bahusaṃvidhānānapekṣayoḥ pratyakṣāgamamūlayoryuktyoḥ prabalatvaṃ tadapekṣāyāstu yuktimūlāyā durbalatvaṃ yuktameva /
GSP33nysu__2u:969: ata eva pramāṇalakṣaṇādau nirūpitasyārthasya punaratra nirūpaṇaṃ na doṣāya /
GSP33nysu__2u:975: vasara ityataḥ pramāṇasāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ prathamaṃ tāvadāha- yāthārthyameveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:1001: evaṃ tarhi lakṣyāpekṣayā bhinnādvayavaccheda ityevocyatāṃ kṛtaṃ jñānatvādinā sājātyena prakṛtānupayoginā varṇitena /
GSP33nysu__2u:1002: yadā ca lakṣyādanyatva pareṣāmavagataṃ tadā parebhyo 'nyatvamapi lakṣyasyārthādavagamyata iti siddhamagrato lakṣaṇaprayojanamiti vaiyarthyameva syāllakṣaṇākhyānasya / *5,125*
GSP33nysu__2u:1003: api ca na tāvadanena lakṣaṇenānavagatenaiva vyavacchinnapratītisambhavaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1009: nāpi kāryeṇa liṅgena tadanupapattyā vā tadavagamaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1019: prathamabhāvitayāvaśyābhyupeyatayā laghorupāyātsādhyasiddhau sambhavatyāṃ caramabhāvitayā avaśyānuṣṭheyatvābhāvena gurāvupāye pravartamānasya tavaivedaṃ (dūṣaro)
GSP33nysu__2u:1021: pradīpe pradīpaṃ prajvālya tamonirāsāya yatamānasyaiva puṃsaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1034: yatra liṅgamavyāpakatvānnāsti tatra lakṣaṇasya pramāṇābhāvātpratyetumaśakyatvena kathaṃ tataḥ prāmāṇyādyavagamaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1038: atha yatra tallakṣaṇe liṅgaṃ nāsti tatra liṅgāntarātpratyetavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1045: lakṣyānumānasya lakṣaṇaprayojanasyobhābhyāmeva siddheḥ kṛtaṃ vyāpakena tena / *5,135*
GSP33nysu__2u:1058: sāsnādimāngauriti viditalakṣaṇasambandho hi yaṃ piṇḍaṃ sāsnādimantaṃ paśyati taṃ nāyamaśvādirnāpi ghaṭādiriti pratipādyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:1062: atha lakṣyapratītinirapekṣameva lakṣaṇena vyavacchedo bodhyata iti matam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1069: asaṅkīrṇatayā gopiṇḍaṃ paśyannapi hi na tāvadayaṃ nāśvo na ghaṭa iti pratyeti yāvallakṣaṇaṃ nāvagacchati /
GSP33nysu__2u:1078: yathā yathārthajñānatatsādhanasya pramāṇasya jñānaṃ tatsādhanaṃ ca sajātīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1083: evaṃ tarhi lakṣyāpekṣayā bhinnādvayavaccheda ityuktaṃ syāditi cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:1085: nahi ko 'pi svasthātmā svasmādeva vyavacchedaṃ lakṣaṇaprayojanamācakṣati(ṣye) / *5,140*
GSP33nysu__2u:1088: vastuto yallakṣyādbhinnaṃ tato vyavacchedāvagamārthatvāllakṣaṇasya pratipādakasya yadyapi lakṣyānyatvajñānamalakṣye(vaśyā)
GSP33nysu__2u:1093: jñānaṃ vinā lakṣyasya alakṣyānyatvajñānaṃ lakṣaṇaprayojanaṃ na siddhayatīti kaścit /
GSP33nysu__2u:1102: yatra liṅgāttadavagamastatra tata eva lakṣaṇaprayojanasiddhervyarthā parasparākusṛṣṭiriti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:1130: tatrādyaṃ lakṣyasvarūpapratipattikāraṇaṃ bhavat tasyānvayo vyavacchedatacchabdavyavahartavyate ca pratipādayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:1147: yastu kāṣṭhaloṣṭhayitaḥ kañcitpadārthaṃ vā kasyacitkiñcicchabdavācyatvaṃ vā na vetti nāsau lakṣaṇaśāstre'dhikriyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:1161: antye kimidaṃ tvadabhidhānamāptopadeśatayā lakṣaṇaṃ bodhayatyuta liṅgādibhāvena /
GSP33nysu__2u:1171: sa hi sarvasya śāstrasya kartāramāptameva manyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:1174: yadi na prativādinaṃ prati śāstraṃ kintu śiṣyaṃ prati tadā pratijñāmātrādevāptavacanācchiṣyasyārthaniścayopapatterhetvādyabhidhānamanarthakatāmāpannaṃ śāstre /
GSP33nysu__2u:1177: lakṣaṇavākyaṃ tu śiṣyameva prati prayojakaṃ pratipannaśāstrakārāptabhāvamiti manyase /
GSP33nysu__2u:1180: asti hi samayagrāhakaṃ śāstraṃ munibhiḥ praṇītaṃ nāmaliṅgānuśāsanavyākaraṇādīti /
GSP33nysu__2u:1184: naca yathārthaṃ pramāṇamiti sāsnādimāngauriti vākyasya lakṣaṇaṃ pratipādyamabhyupagacchāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1190: ayaṃ gaurityādyupadeśādinaikasyāṃ vyaktau gośabdārthatayāvagatāyāṃ kimiyameva vyaktiḥ (evam)
GSP33nysu__2u:1191: utānyāpīti jijñāsamānaṃ pratyanyatrāpi gośabdārthatāṃ vijijñāpayipuruṣadeśāderānantyādinā kartumaśakyatavādidaṃ vyāptiviṣayaṃ vākyamāha“yaḥ sāsnādimānsa gośabdārthaḥ'; iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:1197: yadvā yaḥ pṛthivīti padaṃ vā vyaktiviśeṣasya tadathartāṃ vāvagacchaṃstatpravṛttinimittaṃ
GSP33nysu__2u:1198: jijñāsate taṃ prati pṛthivītvavatī prathivīti pṛthivītvaṃ pṛthivīśabdapravṛttinimittamucyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:1199: tatra yasya vaktaryāptatābuddhiḥ sa tāvatā santuṣyati /
GSP33nysu__2u:1201: athavāsti gaurnāmārtha iti viditavato yatra tatra gavi ghaṭādāvaśvādau ca gobuddhau
GSP33nysu__2u:1204: idamapi pūvarvadāptatvāvadhāraṇānavadhāraṇābhyāṃ dvayāṃ gatimavalambata iti kimatrānupapannam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1207: tatra kiṃ gaurvyavahārasya viśeṣaṇaṃ gośabdo vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:1208: ādye yadyasau goviśiṣṭaṃ vyavahāraṃ nājñāsīt tadā kathaṃ purovartivyaktau tasya kartavyatāmanumānādapi jānīyāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1216: naivaṃ gośabda ityasti viśeṣa iti cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:1221: atha satyapi gotve tadanyatra tadaprayogānneti cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:1222: evaṃ tarhi yatra sāsnādimattvaṃ nāsti tatra gośabdaprayogo 'pi nāsti,
GSP33nysu__2u:1223: yatra sāsnādimattvamasti tatra sarvatrāstīti yo jānīte taṃ prati lakṣaṇābhidhānamiti syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1228: upadeśādinā viśeṣaṇena gavā viśeṣitaṃ vyavahāramavagatavo hi tadanyatra tatkartavyatānumānasādhyetyaṅgīkāre ko virodhaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1229: śabdaviśeṣitavyavahārakartavyatāsādhane 'tiprasaṅgaḥ kiṃ bodhyasya bodhakasya veti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1236: nahi bodhyo bādhaparicayaśūnya ityetāvatā paricitabādhenāpi bodhakena viparītaṃ bodhanīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1242: na hyevamasmābhiḥ pratijñātaṃ yatsarvathā śāstrāntarasādhyaṃ tannocyata iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:1245: yadi ca śāstrāntarasādhyo 'pyartho bhavadīyaśāstrasya viṣayaḥ tarhi vyākaraṇādisādhyamanyadapi kasmānnocyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:1247: sandigdhatādisadbhāve 'pi yadavacanaṃ taduktadiśā śiṣyaireva śakyajñānatvāditi yatkiñcidetat /
GSP33nysu__2u:1249: tenāpi hi smṛtirūpaḥ paratra pūrvadṛṣṭāvabhāso 'dhyāsa ityādīni lakṣaṇāni svaśāstre nibaddhāni /
GSP33nysu__2u:1251: tatraite doṣāstāni lakṣaṇāni kiṃ samāskandantyuta neti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1257: āpātato 'pi duṣyānāṃ tathātve kathamunmattabhāṣitānāmapi tadbhāvo na syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1259: kiñcaivaṃ vadatā prāgbrahmasākṣātkārādbādhyamavyāvahārikaṃ brahmasākṣātkārabādhyaṃ vyāvahārikamiti matamapi parityaktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1261: kiñcaivamasmadīyamapi lakṣaṇaṃ kuto na vyavahāraṃ nirvahet /
GSP33nysu__2u:1283: tadeva mānatvaṃ mānaśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ mālakṣaṇamiti yāvat yadyapi sāsnādimāngauritivadyathārthaṃ pramāṇamityukte 'pi bhavatyeva lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvapratītiḥ
GSP33nysu__2u:1285: tataśca pṛthaṅnirūpyamapi syāttanmā śaṅkīti yāthārthyameva mānatvaṃ na tu sāsnādimattvādgotvamiva tato 'tiriktamityuktam / *5,174*
GSP33nysu__2u:1307: ata eva kaṇādaḥ kriyāvadguṇavatsamavāyikāraṇamiti kriyāvattvamapi dravyalakṣaṇatvenāha /
GSP33nysu__2u:1314: nanu (ca) atra pṛthivyādīni navāpi pakṣīkṛtyaitāni dravyāṇi kriyāvattvāditi prayoktavyam,
GSP33nysu__2u:1322: yeṣāṃ ca sa doṣasteṣāmapyupadeśādinā ghaṭāderdravyatvaniścaye sati taditaramūrtapakṣīkāreṇa dravyatvasādhane kīdṛśo doṣaḥ syādityalam / *5,182*
GSP33nysu__2u:1337: kinnāma kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kriyāśrayayordhāraṇakriyāṃ prati ya ādhārastatkārakam /
GSP33nysu__2u:1339: yadi tarhi vijñānaṃ tatkāraṇaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ dvayamapi /
GSP33nysu__2u:1342: ādye vijñānaṃ kevalapramāṇaṃ pratyakṣānumānāgamalakṣaṇaṃ tatkāraṇamanupramāṇamiti siddhāntavirodhāpātaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1358: tatra sādṛśyārthasya yathāśabdasya tāvadatra na parigrahaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1362: ata eva yathārthānubhavaḥ prametyatra kiṃ yāthārthyamarthasādṛśyamityādiḥ kasyacitpraśco 'nupapannaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1369: tathā cārthaṃ viṣayaṃ nātivartate na vyabhicarati yattatpramāṇamityuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1401: nahi tadviṣayo grāmādiḥ sarvathā na jñeya iti śakyate vaktum /
GSP33nysu__2u:1404: yathā hi pitari sādhurmātari sādhuritivākyaṃ yatkiñcitpitrādau sādhutvena na paryavasyati,
GSP33nysu__2u:1410: sati caivaṃ śabdamahimānamanādṛtya pratyavatiṣṭhamānaḥ chalavāditayā jīyeta /
GSP33nysu__2u:1411: tathā prakṛte 'pi jñeyaśabdasya sambandhiśabdatvātsvajñeyaṃ nātivartate yat tatpramāṇamityuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1413: nopādhinā gamanena vā nimittena grāmo jñeyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1414: yena tamanatikramya vartamānaṃ gamanaṃ yathārthaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1418: tadidamuktaṃ kriyārtheṣu sā na matā śabdārthatattvaviduṣāmiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:1426: ādye 'pi vyāptiḥ kiṃ deśataḥ kiṃvā kālataḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:1437: pareṇāṅgīkṛtamupādāyāsmābhirvyavahriyate na tu kimapi lakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpyata iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:1439: nahi svaprakāśaṃ tattvamityetāvatā vinā vedāntādhigamaṃ tadadhigamaḥ śakyo 'ṅgīkartum /
GSP33nysu__2u:1440: athāveditasya sattvaṃ tattvāvedakatvamiti nirbrūyāttadā vibhrame 'tivyāptiḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:1442: atha yāvadāveditasya sattvaṃ tattvāvedakatvaṃ sadekagocaratvamiti yāvaditi vadet,
GSP33nysu__2u:1445: na hīdamaṃśo vā rajatatvādijātirvā tatsambandhaḥ samavāyo vā tattādātmyaṃ vā na sat /

GSP33nysu__2u:2426: yo 'gnimānna bhavati sa dhūmavānna bhavatīti vyatirekavyāptiḥ kiṃ dhūmenāgnisādhane upayujyate kiṃvāgnyabhāvena dhūmābhāvasādhane /
GSP33nysu__2u:2433: yadabhāvayorvyāpyavyāpakabhāvastayoreva sādhyasādhanabhāva ityabhyupagame nātiprasaṅga iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:2435: yadabhāvayorvyāpyavyāpakabhāvastayoreva sādhyasādhanabhāva ityabhyupagame nātiprasaṅga iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:2437: yadabhāvo yadabhāvasya vyāpakaḥ sa tasya vyāpya iti niyamādadoṣa iti cet(na) /
GSP33nysu__2u:2442: kinnāma sāpyanvayarūpaiveti na sarvathā vyāptidvaividhyaṃ sambhavatīti / *5,377*
GSP33nysu__2u:2454: vyāptimātramevānumānāṅgaṃ na punaḥ sapakṣe tadupadarśanamapītyato vyatirekayorvyāptyā tadupapādanaṃ kriyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:2456: jīvaccharīraṃ sātmakaṃ prāṇādimattvāt yatprāṇādimattatsātmakaṃ prāṇādimaccedaṃ tasmātsātmakamiti prayukte dhūmasyāgninevāsya na vyāptirdṛśyate
GSP33nysu__2u:2461: tadetāvati vaktavye yadanyathā prayujyate tadvivekināṃ sphuṭapratītikatayā saṅgraharucitayā veti /
GSP33nysu__2u:2463: vyāpyaṃ cedanumānaṃ tadā dhūmaḥ śabdānityatve 'pyanumānaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2467: tathāca yo yena vyāpyaḥ sa tasminnanumānamityuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2492: caturthāstu parasparaṃ vyāpyavyāpakabhāvādanyonyamanumānatāmarhantaḥ prasiddhayaprasiddhibhyāṃ viśiṣṭanta iti saṅkṣepaḥ / *5,382*
GSP33nysu__2u:2493: nanvevamapi dhūmenāgnijñānaṃ sarveṣāṃ syādityata uktaṃ smṛteti /
GSP33nysu__2u:2509: sya yo dhūmavānasāvagnimāniti vyāptismaraṇasyānantaramayaṃ cāgnivyāptadhūmavāniti pratisandhānātmakaṃ yaddhūmajñānaṃ tattṛtīyamanumānamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:2515: tato vyāptismṛtau satyāṃ kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadarthaṃ tṛtīyaṃ jñānameṣyavyamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:2519: naca tatsaṅkalitatvaṃ vinā tṛtīyajñānāditi kathaṃ tannaiṣyavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2527: yadā tu gṛhītavyāptervināpi liṅgadarśanādvacanādinaiva vyāptismṛtirāvirasti yadā dvitīyameva liṅgadarśanaṃ pratisandhānātmakamudeṣyatīti nāvaśyambhāvinīyaṃ prakriyā /
GSP33nysu__2u:2528: yathā khalu saṃskārasāhitye satīndriyasannikarṣādeva so 'yamiti pratyabhijñā jāyate tathe(thātrāpī)
GSP33nysu__2u:2544: nanu yo dhūmavānso 'gnimāniti vyāptyuktiḥ kathaṃ pratyāyanāṅgam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2550: prathamata eva vyāptyukterasaṅgatatvādityāśaṅkāṃ pariharan“uktā vyāptireva sā';
GSP33nysu__2u:2560: yo hi parvatamagnimantaṃ pratipadyamānaḥ pareṇa niragnikaṃ manyamānena kiṃ parvatasyāgnimatve mānamityanuyujyate,
GSP33nysu__2u:2561: sa yadi yo dhūmavānasāvagnimāniti vyāptimātraṃ (paraṃ prati)
GSP33nysu__2u:2577: vyadhikaraṇo 'pi hi kṛttikāgata evodayo rohiṇyudayāsattiṃ gamayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:2579: tatastāvadanena vaktavyaṃ yāvatā vyāptivivakṣitasthaladharmatopetatayā liṅgasyānusandhānaṃ syāt tadapyākāṅkṣākrameṇābhidhātavyamiti sthite,
GSP33nysu__2u:2580: nirāśrayasya pramāṇasyābhidhātumaśakyatvāt pramāṇajijñāsotthāpanāya viṣayopakṣeparūpaṃ parvato 'gnimāniti pratijñāvākyaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2586: tadevametāvati vaktavye kathaṃ vyāptimātramuktvā kṛtī syāditi / *5,390*
GSP33nysu__2u:2590: tathāpyākāṅkṣitatvālliṅgasvarūpasya tatpakṣadharmatāyāśca pratipādanāya hetūpanayau vaktavyāviti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:2593: kiṃ yena dhūmavattvaṃ parvatavṛttitayāvagataṃ taṃ prati hetūpanayau vaktavyau,
GSP33nysu__2u:2601: taccedvijñānaṃ parasya svatassiddhaṃ tadā kiṃ hetūpanayābhyāmiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2603: yadi liṅgamasiddhaṃ syāt kuta evāsya mānatā // MAnuv_2,1.32cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:2612: viparatītasya tu vyāpyatvāsiddhayā tatpramāṇameva na bhavati (iti)
GSP33nysu__2u:2629: tathāca viditaliṅgasvarūpapakṣadharmatvaṃ prati tatsmārakatvena liṅgatayānusandhāyakatvenetaraṃ prati tajjijñāsājanakatvena hetūpanayayoḥ sārthakyamevetyāśaṅkayāha- yadīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:2630: yadi smārakamātraṃ syāt smarturnātra prayojanam // MAnuv_2,1.33ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:2643: petasya liṅgasya smaraṇānusandhānajijñāsājanakaṃ syāditi yadyucyate tanna /
GSP33nysu__2u:2644: yato vyāptivacanenaiva tatsmaraṇādimatastasya hetvādinā prayojanaṃ nāstīti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__2u:2646: yadi hi hetvādikaṃ vākyatayā pratyāyakaṃ syāttadā samārthyacintopayujyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:2647: yadā tu tatsmārakatvādinaivopayuktaṃ tadā saṃskārodbodhopayuktaṃ sādṛśyasambandhādikaṃ kimapyanve(pye)ṣyavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2649: yo dhūmavānasāvagnimānityabhihite khalvanumānamudrāvit atra dhūmavattvaṃ vyāpyamityavabudhyata eva /
GSP33nysu__2u:2662: parepadeśaṃ vākyaṃ yadi smaraṇādimātrakāraṇamaṅgīkriyate tadātra vyāptivacane satyeva smarturvyāptivacanādeva smaraṇādyutpatteriti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__2u:2663: atra vyāptivacanātirikte śabde prayojanaṃ nāstīti nāsāvavaśyaṃ vaktavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2666: tatra vakturāptatvāvadhāraṇādanusaraṇaṃ prativādini tu tannāstīti cenmā bhūt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2673: kiṃ prakaraṇādyāpannatayāyaṃ na vadatyutāpratipannatvādineti sandehasya prakṛte 'pi tulyatvāditi / *5,402*
GSP33nysu__2u:2680: tathāca pratijñāvākyena viṣayamupakṣipya tatra hetunā pramāṇasvarūpamupadarśya tasyodāharaṇavākyena viruddhānadhyavasitānaikāntikatvanirāsaḥ kriyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:2684: agnimāneva na tu niragnika iti bādhapratipakṣapratikṣepaḥ kriyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:2699: dṛṣṭāntādiṣu caivaṃ syāt sādhanaṃ punareva hi // MAnuv_2,1.34ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:2721: tathāpyavāntarākāṅkṣānivartakatvena pañcāvayavamevāvāntaravākyaṃ parisamāpyata ityata āha- liṅgeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:2726: evaṃ sati kimatra pramāṇamityavāntarākāṅkṣānivṛttihetau dhūmatvamiti liṅgoktau kṛtāyāmapi avāntaravākyaparyavasānamavaśyaṃ bhavatīti tanmātrameva vākyamaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2728: yaduktaṃ smaraṇādimātrahetutvena vākyasyopayogastacca vyāptivacanamātreṇa bhavatīti vyāptireva vaktavyeti tadayuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2741: doṣaparijñāna eva tadviyuktā yuktiḥ sujñānetyato yuktidoṣo nirūpaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2763: bādhalakṣaṇamayogyatvaṃ virodha iti śiṣyairevohyatāmityāśayavānasaṅgatiṃ nirūpayati- pratijñāyāmiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:2772: nanu kathaṃ dve evānumānadūṣaṇe paraparigaṇitānāmasiddhatvādīnāṃ bahūnāṃ sattvādityatasteṣāmatrāntarbhāvaṃ vibhāvayitu virodhavibhāgamāha- virodho 'pīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:2776: asaṅgatirapyanekavidheti vā tridhaiva na tvekavidhaiva yenāsiddhayādīnāmantarbhāvo durghaṭaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2786: yatrārthe liṅgapramitiḥ sādhyasiddhayupayoginī tatra tadabhāvo liṅgarāhityam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2790: naca sādhanasya tadbhāve 'pi viruddhasya sādhyatā sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:2800: nanvevaṃ sati siddhasādhanatāpi virodha eva syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2807: naca siddhasādhanasya sākāṅkṣatā astīti nāsau virodhe 'ntarbhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:2808: nanu cānyatra trividho virodha ityādinā liṅgarāhityāvyāptyorekatāmupādāya sādhyasya sādhanasya vānugamo dṛṣṭāntavirodhastṛtīyatayā parigṛhītaḥ
GSP33nysu__2u:2819: svārthānumāne hi dṛṣṭavyāptikasya liṅgasya vivakṣitasthale siddhimātreṇa sādhyapramitirutpadyata
GSP33nysu__2u:2822: tvavyāptyaupayikasyāpi dṛṣṭāntadoṣasya tadāśrayatayā pratītatvena tathaivodbhavanīyatājñāpanāya tena saha trividhatvamanyatroktamiti na virodhaḥ
GSP33nysu__2u:2831: sādhyādyavyāptistu dṛṣṭāntasya guṇa eva na doṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2832: sato hi satā vyāptiṃ pradarśayituṃ dṛṣṭānto 'nveṣyavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2833: vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntasyāyaṃ doṣa iti cetsa eva kimarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2836: pāramparyeṇopayogo tu sādharmyadṛṣṭānta evāsāviti kiṃ pṛthagupādānena /
GSP33nysu__2u:2840: nahi sarvatra dṛṣṭānta eva vyāptirupadarśanīyetyasti niyamaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2867: pramāṇatadābhāsāviveka eva hi pramāṇaśabdaprayogo na tvaprāmāṇyaniścaye /
GSP33nysu__2u:2868: ahīnabalatayā vā viśeṣaṇe sambhavati tadavāntarabhedopādānaṃ niratharkameva /
GSP33nysu__2u:2870: liṅgarāhityagrahaṇena cādūṣaṇānāmapi dūṣaṇatayā paraparigaṇitānāmāśrayavyadhikaraṇasādhyānyathāsiddhīnāṃ nirāso labhyate anyathāsiddherdūṣaṇatve 'pi prakārāntasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2871: anadhyavasitatvādibhedo 'pi kiṃ vyāptyabhāve sambhavatītyetāvatā parisaṅkhayeyo vyavahāropayogitvādvā /
GSP33nysu__2u:2876: nedaṃ sādhakamanaikāntikatvādityasya hi sapakṣavṛttitve sati vipakṣavṛttitvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2882: śiṣyamativaiśadyāya vyutpādanaṃ tvanumatameveti na svīyavyavahāravirodha iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:2897: tatkiṃ kṛtakatvaṃ kṛśānuśaityaṃ vā śabdanityatvaṃ vā sādhayituṃ svayameva pravṛttam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2905: yathā niśātam kṛśānuśaityādau vyāpārayanpuruṣa evāparādhī syāt natu kṛtakatvādikamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:2909: tataḥ kṛśānuśaityādeḥ sādhyatānarhatvaṃ nityatvādisādhane kṛtakatvāderasamarthatvamityādirarthaśabdagata eva doṣo 'ṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2910: na hyupādhimantarbhāvya bhavan doṣo na doṣo bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:2920: tena sādhanasya hiṃsātvādervailomyaṃ sādhyāpekṣayā vaiparītyamavyāptatvamiti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__2u:2924: sādhyavyāpakatve sati sādhanāvyāpako hi dharma upādhiḥ,
GSP33nysu__2u:2933: vyāptijñānādhīnamupādhijñānaṃ tadadhīnaṃ ca nirupādhikatvajñānaṃ tadāyattaṃ vyāptijñānamiti cakrakaprasaṅgena tasya vyāptilakṣaṇatvānupapatteḥ
GSP33nysu__2u:2939: vastutastu yo dharmo yadvayāpakāvyāptastasya tenāvyāptirityeva vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2941: sādhanasya sādhyavyāpakaparityāgo hi pakṣādanyatra vā syātpakṣe vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:2944: dvitīye tu sādhyavyāpakasya pakṣādvayāvṛttiḥ sādhyamapi vyāvartayatīti satpratipakṣataiva /
GSP33nysu__2u:2946: nahi yadabhāvo yatra dūṣaṇaṃ so 'pi tatra dūṣaṇamiti yukta virodhāditi parāstam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2948: etadarthaṃ ca sādhyavyāpakasya vailomyaṃ pakṣādvayāvṛttiḥ sādhanasya satpratipakṣateti yojanīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:2950: nanu ca prāganumānādapi satpratipakṣatānumānottaramavyāptirvā kinna syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2953: naca vyāptigrahaṇasamaye pakṣādipravibhāgo 'stīti kathaṃ tadā pratipakṣatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2956: tathāca sādhyarahite tatra vartamānaṃ sādhanaṃ sādhyaṃ vyabhicaratīti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:2961: tarhi vyāpakavyāvṛttyā pratipakṣeṇaivānumāne dūṣite kiṃ tadupajīvinā vyabhicāreṇeti tulyam / *5,437*
GSP33nysu__2u:2962: kiñca pakṣe vyabhicāraḥ kiṃ niścita uta sandigdhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2971: upādheḥ sādhyavyāpakatvaniścaye tadvayāvṛttyā sādhyavyāvṛttiniścayaḥ sati ca tasminnasāviti /
GSP33nysu__2u:2973: kathaṃ tadvayāvṛttyā pakṣe sādhanasya niścito vyabhicāraḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:2974: pakṣe sandigdho vyabhicārastu svata eva siddho sopādhimukhanirīkṣaṇāpekṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:2979: anukūlatarkādinā sādhyavyāpakatvaniścaye sati pakṣe niścitavyabhicāritāsiddhiriti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:2981: tathāpi sopādhikatvaṃ satpratipakṣatvamiti gataḥ pakṣa iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:2984: nirdhārite tu sāmarthye bādhako vā syāt,
GSP33nysu__2u:2986: atra sopādhikatvamiti vaktavye sādhyavyāpakavailomyamiti vacanamupādhilakṣaṇasyāpi pradarśanārtham /
GSP33nysu__2u:3006: tadidamiṣyamapi tyajati aniṣyamapi gṛhṇātīti na viśeṣaṇam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3011: upādheḥ syāttadā tasya samavyāptiryadā bhavet'; iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3014: kiṃ viṣamavyāptikasya vyāpyatvābhāvāttatsambandhena sādhanābhimate vyāpyatābhramānupapatteradoṣatvena tadvayavacchedāya samapadamiti,
GSP33nysu__2u:3025: nanu ca viṣamavyāptikasya pratipakṣonnāyakatvaṃ na sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:3040: asammatau tu tatra doṣāntarameva bhaviṣyatīti kimanupapannam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3041: nanu śaṅkitopādhau kathaṃ pratipakṣaḥ sandigdhāsiddhiprasaṅgenāsamabalatvāditi cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:3045: sādhyavyāpakatve sati sādhanāvyāpakatvaṃ kimupādhisāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ kiṃvā viśeṣalakṣaṇam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3049: naca sādhanāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakasya yatkiñcidavacchinnasādhyavyāpakasya ca nopādhitvamiti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3062: yathā samavāyaḥ sambandhatve sati samavetatvena hīno 'kāryatvādākāśavat /
GSP33nysu__2u:3065: śabdo na sparśavadviśeṣaguṇaḥ pratyakṣatve satyakāraṇaguṇapūrvakatvādityādāviva vyabhicāraparihārārthatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3067: yathā vāyuḥ spārśano na bhavati dravyatve satyacākṣuṣatvāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:3070: yo yatsādhyavyāpako yatsādhanāvyāpaka iti vāsyārtha iti sarvaṃ sustham / *5,467*
GSP33nysu__2u:3076: evaṃ tarhi durbalena virodho 'pi pratijñārthaviruddhatā syāt,
GSP33nysu__2u:3081: prakaraṇādivaśāddhi sāmānyaśabdā api viśeṣe vatarnta iti prasiddham /
GSP33nysu__2u:3082: yathā viśiṣṭasamaye puruṣamānayetyukte puruṣaviśeṣa evānīyate na tu yaḥ ko 'pi puruṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3098: svavākyena virodhe 'pi naiva sādhakatāṃ vrajet // MAnuv_2,1.38ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:3102: kintu svavākyena virodhe 'pi pramāṇaṃ naiva sādhakatāṃ vrajet /
GSP33nysu__2u:3126: kinnāma tadanapekṣasya pratyakṣāderapi tathā cānyatropalabdhasāmarthyasyānumāne 'pi svātantryasiddhirityāśayavatā prastāvādanumānamiti vaktavye pramāṇamityevādhikṛtam / *5,475*
GSP33nysu__2u:3130: pramāṇavirodhe hi heturapakṣadharmo vā syāt anaikāntiko vā (syāt) /
GSP33nysu__2u:3136: yadi hi pakṣaṃ vihāya bahirevāvinābhāvo 'vagamyate tadā bahirvyāptibalena pakṣadharmo 'pi heturna pakṣe sādhyaṃ sādhayet /
GSP33nysu__2u:3137: asiddhā hi tatra tasya sādhyena vyāptiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3144: api ca kiṃ vyāptigrahaṇasamaye 'vyāpterupasthāpakaḥ pramāṇavirodhaḥ syāt,
GSP33nysu__2u:3159: saṃvādānuktisaṃyuktā eta eva ca nigrahāḥ // MAnuv_2,1.38cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:3162: nanu ca pratijñāhānyādīnāṃ vaktṛdoṣāṇāṃ kathamarthavacanadoṣeṣu virodhāsaṅgatinyūnādhikyeṣvanupraveśa ityata uktam- saṃvādānuktisaṃyuktāṃ iti
GSP33nysu__2u:3170: tatrānumānasyaiva yadasādhāraṇaṃ virodhādi tatrānumānadoṣāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ praveśo 'bhihitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3173: nanu keyaṃ kathā nāmetyapekṣāyāṃ tatsvarūpaṃ nirūpayansāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ vibhāgamuddeśaṃ cāha- vāda iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3174: vādo jalpo vitaṇḍeti kathāstisro vijānatām // MAnuv_2,1.39ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:3182: tāśca kathā vādādibhedena tisraḥ trividhā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3192: tuśabdena tattvanirṇayasādhanādapi jalpaviśeṣāt taduddeśena pravṛttatvavailakṣaṇyaṃ darśayita /
GSP33nysu__2u:3193: yadā tu viditatattvau vītarāgāvaviditatattvaiḥ parairabhyarthitau kathāṃ kurutastadā tatrāvyāptemetallakṣaṇam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3195: anyatrānantarbhāvena tisra ityasya vyāghātādityata uktam- svārthaṃ parārthamapi veti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3216: sadbhiḥ svasiddhāntamaprakāśyāsādhayitvāsatāṃ pakṣasya dūṣaṇameva kriyate yatsā vitaṇḍetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3217: prativādinaḥ svapakṣasādhanena vinā parapakṣapratikṣepamātreṇa paryavasyantī kathā vitaṇḍetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:3221: tattvajñānāyogyānasataḥ prati sadbhiḥ svasiddhāntasādhane teṣāṃ tattvajñānotpādaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3226: naca svapakṣasādhanahīnāyāṃ vitaṇḍāyāṃ tatsambhavatītyata āha- ukta iti //

GSP33nysu__2u:3229: tairasadbhiḥ prathamaṃ svapakṣasādhanāya māne ukte sati sadbhistasya mānasya dūṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3230: asato vādibhūtasya svapakṣasādhanaṃ parapakṣanirākaraṇaṃ ca karaṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3233: tata etāmeva saṅgatimāśritya ṭīkākṛtā tatraiva vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3241: anyathātyantāpakṛṣṭo 'pyutkṛṣṭatamena vaiyātyāt ghaṭamāno yadi vā daivāyattamabhibhāvayet tadā vṛthākhyātiṃ labheta /
GSP33nysu__2u:3249: vidyāparīkṣāpūrvaiva vitaṇḍā jalpa eva ca // MAnuv_2,1.42ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:3251: vidyāparīkṣā pūrvā kāraṇabhūtā yasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3257: nanu jalpavitaṇḍārthinovirdyāsāmyādiniścayāya kartavyā parīkṣā kiṃ kathayā, utānyathā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3269: yato vidyayoccatvena nirṇītatvameva jayo nīcatvena nirṇītatvaṃ ca parājaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3276: tattvanirṇītiṃ vinoccanīcatvavijñānaṃ na hītyevokte vinā vādeneti vakṣyamāṇavirodhaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3281: tathāpi taduddeśenāpravṛttestādarthvasya prathamamaniścayānna tadarthaṃ jalpo dātuṃ śakyate / *5,500*
GSP33nysu__2u:3299: tau ca vāda eva sambhavato na jalpavitaṇḍayoḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3307: tena vādenaiva tasya nīcoccabhāvasya siddhau satyāmanyayorjalpavitaṇḍayorvyarthatā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3313: prāk parīkṣāto lokasaṃvādādinānyatarasya pratiyogyapekṣayā bahuvidyatvasiddhau tu vādo 'pi naiva dātavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3320: vādo hi vidyāparīkṣākāraṇamityeṣyavyo na tu vyasanitayā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3321: tatphalaṃ tvanyata eva jātamiti kiṃ parīkṣayā kiṃ tadaṅgena vādeneti / *5,503*
GSP33nysu__2u:3331: yataḥ sabhādipūrvastataḥ spardhināmapi vādo yujyata eveti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3345: vidyāparīkṣārthe vāde jayino 'rthādikamapi sabhāpatinā sampādanīyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3350: naca phalāntaramasti yena punarjalpavitaṇḍārambhaḥ syādityata āha- tattvāprakāśa eveti // *5,506*
GSP33nysu__2u:3363: tathā satyarthādīnāṃ bhedena kathā'nantyaprasaṅgādityata āha- tattveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3364: yadyapi arthādayo 'vāntarabhedabhinnāstathāpi tattvāprakāśa eka eva vitaṇḍājalpayoḥ phalam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3369: vinā vādena vidyāyā yadi śakyaṃ parīkṣaṇam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3374: tadā samavidyayoḥ prathamamapi jalpādiḥ kathāviśeṣaḥ kāryaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3375: tarhi vidyāparīkṣaṇaṃ vādenaivetyuktivirodha ityata āha- vā eveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3378: vāda eva prathamaṃ kartavyo bhavediti yaduktaṃ tadanyathā vādena vinā vidyāparīkṣaṇasya kartumaśakyatva evāto na virodha iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3386: athavā samāhārarūpaṃ kathāntaraṃ yadvā nimittadvayasamāveśe vādaśabdasyaiva vyavahārānupapattiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3388: jalpa ityapi nāma syād vādasyaitādṛśasya tu // MAnuv_2,1.48ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:3390: etādṛśasya nimittadvayopetasyātra jalpa iti nāma syādityabhyupagamenādyo nirastaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3396: vādasya jalpa ityapi nāma syāditi vādasaṃjñā tu mukhyā jalpasaṃjñā tvamukhyeti sūcitam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3400: yadyapi kathakāvādito vijigīṣū tathāpi sabhyādibhivirjigīṣāṃ paribhāvyotpāditā tattvanirṇayārthitaiva kathopayoginī /
GSP33nysu__2u:3401: arthādilābhaścāntarā prāpto na tvādita evoddiṣya ityamukhya eva /
GSP33nysu__2u:3402: ata eva pūrva ubhayārthaḥ syādityukte sāmyapratītiprasaktau nirṇītijayakāraka iti tattvanirṇīteḥ prādhānyapradarśanārthaṃ vivaraṇaṃ kṛtam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3409: sa ca vādasambandhyevāsyāṃ kathāyāmastītyato vādatvameva mukhyamityāśayavānāha- pratijñeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3412: vidyāparīkṣārthāyāṃ kathāyāṃ kvāpi prameye pratijñāmātreṇa pramāṇopanyāsarahitena vacanena sādhyatvaṃ prajñāpanīyaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3423: evambhāvo hi vādiprativādinoḥ saṃvāde 'nyonyāptatā'śvāse satyeva syāt tadāśvāso hi vāda eva sambhavati na jalpe /
GSP33nysu__2u:3434: na hyekatrāptaḥ sarvatrāpta eveti niyamo 'stīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3435: yājñavalkyenāpi tatra tatra pramāṇopanyāsaḥ kṛta eveti sakalamanākulam / *5,517*
GSP33nysu__2u:3443: evaśabdau tu vaiṣṇavā eva rāgadveṣavihīnā eveti sambaddhayete /
GSP33nysu__2u:3457: evaṃ tarhi tairevālaṃ kiṃ sabhyairityata āha- etaditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:3461: kvacitsūkṣme prameye eteṣāṃ prāśnikānāṃ kāraṇāntaradvājñāne sati vādinorguṇadoṣanirṇayāya sabhyāśca pramāṇaṃ syuriti vakṣyamāṇenānvayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3470: eṣāṃ sabhyānāṃ cājñāne sati dūragā deśāntarasthāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3480: ubhābhyāṃ sādhanaṃ caiva dūṣaṇaṃ vādajalpayoḥ // MAnuv_2,1.51ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:3486: idānīṃ tu vitaṇḍāyā lakṣaṇadvayaṃ vivakṣustāvadupayuktamāha- ubhābhyāmiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3505: īśvarādiprameye mukhyo vedādirāgama eva vaktavyaḥ (tasya svātantryeṇa sādhyasiddhayaṅgatvāt)
GSP33nysu__2u:3525: saugato yadi dvayavayavaprayogaṃ kuryāttadā naiyāyikena nyūnena nigṛhyeta /
GSP33nysu__2u:3529: tathāca niyatāvayavādivyatirekeṇa vitaṇḍaiva na syādityata āha- svasiddhānteti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3537: adūṣaṇe tu parapakṣādūṣaṇena kathābhāvaprasaṅgādityata āha- pratyakṣeti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3541: āgame tu vādinā prayukte prativādinā vaidikena tasyānyārthataiva daśarnīyā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3560: śrutyādīnāṃ vedādīnāṃ śrutirliṅgaṃ samākhyā cetyuktānāṃ liṅgagrahaṇenaiva gṛhītatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3562: parārthe pramāṇānukūlyasya svārthe tatprātikūlyasya ca nirāso darśanīya ityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3568: naca vastutattva eva vādināṃ vipratipatteravaśyaṃ nyūnādyavatārasambhavenāprayogaprāptiriti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3569: (ta)yasya yatra tāttvikatvābhimānastena tatprayogānantaraṃ pareṇa nyūnādāvudbhāvite tathārūpatāyāḥ sādha(nīyatvāt)nāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3574: svasvaniyamasyaiva tātvikatvamupetya tadanatikrameṇaiva prayogāṅgīkāre tu sarvathā kathocchedāpatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3580: niyamād yo 'numāṃ brūyād taṃ brūyād yadi tādṛśī /
GSP33nysu__2u:3585: pañca pratijñāhetūdāhaṇopanayanigamanāni vāvayavā yasyāḥ sā tripañcāvayavā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3593: taṃ prati yaḥ saugato niyamādyugmāvayavinīṃ brūyāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3594: sa yadi tādṛśī tryavayavā pañcāvayavā ca nānumeti brūyāditi yojyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3598: naiyāyikena saugataṃ prati pañcāvayavaprayoge vihite saugato 'dhikamiti nigṛhṇīyāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3601: atha naiyāyikenāprāmāṇikatvamasiddhamiti vadatā kathamiti saugate pṛṣṭavati (sati)
GSP33nysu__2u:3608: iti bhāratādivākyamastīti cenna“saukṣmyaṃ saṅkhayākramaścaiva nirṇayaśca prayojanam';
GSP33nysu__2u:3618: na tāvadidamanumānaṃ tvaccetasi parivartamānaṃ paraṃ pratyāyanāṅgam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3649: yasmātprayogeyattāsādhanaṃ vādiprativādibhyāmanyatareṇa vā svamataparityāgenānyamatābhyupagame kṛta evopapadyate nānyathā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3654: tadā dvayavayavasya tāttvikatvaṃ svayaṃ manyate na vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3657: evaṃ kathābhāvaprasaṅgabhīruḥ saugato 'pi pañcāvayavena dvayavayavasyāvaśyakatāṃ pratipadyamānastattvaṃ manyate na vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3661: asmādeva saṅkaṭādbibhyadudayano yathāvastu vaktavyamityuktvā yathāsiddhāntaṃ vā vaktavyamiti samayaṃ baddhvā pravṛttāyāṃ kathāyāṃ na nyūnādyavatāra iti pakṣāntaramavādīditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:3672: tatra kiṃ vākyārthamātraṃ sādhyate tadviśeṣo vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3675: dvitīye sa viśeṣaḥ pratīto na vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3685: dvitīye tu nedaṃ vākyārthānumānaṃ kintu siddhe 'rthe vākyasya liṅgatānumānameva /
GSP33nysu__2u:3704: api ca vedānusāreṇa paṭhyamāneṣu laukikavākyeṣu katham /
GSP33nysu__2u:3713: anubhūtiḥ pramāṇaṃ cet kena smṛtirapodyate // MAnuv_2,1.58ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:3718: yadi smṛtirna pramā tadā smṛtiḥ lakṣaṇena vyāvartanīyā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3738: saṃskārasya kāraṇatve 'pi nāsau sattāmātreṇa smṛtiṃ janayati kinnāmodbuddha eva /
GSP33nysu__2u:3743: nacāvacchedakena vinā niyamo jñātuṃ śakyata iti / *5,549*
GSP33nysu__2u:3744: yadvā anubhūtiḥ pramāṇaṃ cettadā smṛtāvavyāptiriti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3747: smṛtiḥ kena nimittenāpodyate pramāṇādbahiḥ kriyate na kenāpītyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3762: pūrvānubhūte kiṃ mānamityukte syāt kimuttaram // MAnuv_2,1.58cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:3764: yadi smṛtirapramāṇaṃ syāttadā pūrvānubhūte kiṃ mānamiti praśno niruttaraḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3775: nanu yadi smṛtiḥ pramā syāttadā tatkāraṇasya saṃskārasyānupramāṇatvaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33nysu__2u:3781: hi yasmāttatsmaraṇaṃ mānasaṃ manaḥpratyakṣajaṃ na saṃskārakaraṇakaṃ tato noktadoṣa iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3784: smaraṇasya mānasatvaṃ sākṣātkāratvaṃ ca kuta ityata āha- tacceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3791: nanvindriyāṇāṃ prāpyakāritvaniyamādatītena ca manasaḥ prāpterayogātkathaṃ smṛtermānasapratyakṣajatvamityata āha- atīteti //
GSP33nysu__2u:3800: tathāhi śrutiḥ“apaśyamapyaye māyayā viśvakarmaṇyado jagannihitaṃ śubhracakṣuḥ'; iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3805: evañca yathā yogināmindriyeṇaivātītānāgatātharsākṣātkārastathātītamapi manasā smaryata iti ko doṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3806: nanvindriyasyārthaprāptirnāma na saṃyogaḥ samavāyo veti niyamaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3810: evaṃ tarhi manaso 'pi pūrvānubhavajanitasaṃskārasācivyalakṣaṇāstyatītārthena pratyāsattirityāśayavatoktam- pūrvānubhūtaṃ ceti // *5,554*
GSP33nysu__2u:3812: yadi prāptiḥ saṃyogādilakṣaṇā vivakṣitā tadā tadabhāvo 'naikāntikaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3815: kāryadarśanavaśācceyaṃ kalpanāsau nātiprasaṅga iti darśayituṃ ca /
GSP33nysu__2u:3816: etena mānasaṃ cetsmaraṇaṃ syānna saṃskārajaṃ tadānanubhūte 'pyu(vyu)
GSP33nysu__2u:3823: etanmayā pūrvaṃ kṛtamityetanmayā manasā vijñātaṃ smṛtamapīti smaraṇasya mānasatvaṃ sākṣādanubhavātsākṣyanubhavena siddhamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3824: yaduktaṃ paraiḥ pūrvānubhavāvacchinnārthagocarā smṛtistadyāthārthyādikamanuvidadhānā na svayaṃ yathārtheti,
GSP33nysu__2u:3827: nanu manaso 'pratyakṣatvātkathaṃ smaraṇasya mānasatā sākṣipratyakṣagamyeti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:3829: tathāpi kāryakāraṇabhāvo na pratyakṣa iti cedanvayavyatirekasacivasya sākṣiṇastatra prāmāṇyābhyupagamāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:3841: yasmānmānatrayamevaṃlakṣaṇakaṃ tasmādbrahmādivastuṣu veda eva pramāṇaṃ na yuktyādestatrāvakāśaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3852: ya(ta)smādvedaviṣaye na yukteravakāśastato virodho 'pi sa evokta ityupapannam /
GSP33nysu__2u:3873: dṛṣṭavyāptiviruddhatvāt tatra mānaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_2,1.62 //
GSP33nysu__2u:3880: dṛṣṭā pramitā vyāptiryasyā yukteḥ sā tathoktā /
GSP33nysu__2u:3908: nityatvena vedaprāmāṇyasya sthitau tu viśeṣaṇāsiddhiniścaya eva /
GSP33nysu__2u:3909: phalavyabhicāramātrasya hetutve tu anaikāntikatvamityevaṃ vyāptipakṣadharmatāvirahavyutpādanena yuktivirodhaḥ parihṛtaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3921: tato 'nukūlatarkasanāthenopādhivyabhicārānupalambhasahakṛtena sahabhāgagrāhakeṇa pramāṇena siddhā mṛttvādīnāmavaktṛtvādinā vyāptiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3927: nanu ca nityatayā vedasya prāmāṇye vyavasthite tadviruddhāyā yukterevāprāmāṇyamucitamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:3941: tadevaṃ mṛdabravīdityādivedavākyānāṃ yuktiviruddhatvenāprāmāṇye vedatvāt“yato vā imāni (bhūtāni)
GSP33nysu__2u:3946: vedasya yukteśca niravakāśatvaṃ tata iti parāmṛśati /
GSP33nysu__2u:3949: asyāṃ śrutau vaktṛtvādinā pratipādyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:3971: keṣāñciccetanānāṃ mṛdādyabhimānitvaṃ tatastacchabdānāṃ teṣu vṛvirvyāpakatvaṃ sadehatvamantardhānaśaktistatparatā ca śruterityanekasya kalpyamānatvāt
GSP33nysu__2u:3986: tathāca kathaṃ vedaprāmāṇye 'pi na dīyate dṛṣṭiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4004: tāni tāni mṛdādīni nāmāni vācakāni yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4012: yaccoktaṃ vacanavṛttyaṅgīkāraḥ prakṛtānupayogīti tatparihārāyoktaṃ tattanmṛdādivastvabhimānina iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4014: mṛdādiśabdānāṃ cetanaviṣayatāmātreṇa prakṛtavirodhaśāntāvapi vastusthitiṃ vijijñāpayiṣatā sūtrakāreṇa vyapadeśastviti tuśabdena mukhyavṛttiḥ sūcitā /
GSP33nysu__2u:4021: nanvatra tannāmaka ityekavacanaṃ prakramya tattannāmāna iti bahuvacanaprayoge kinnimittam /
GSP33nysu__2u:4033: vyāptānāṃ sadehatve 'nupalambhabādha ityetatparihārāya viśeṣānugatibhyāmiti sūtrakhaṇḍaṃ kaścidanya iti tātparyato vyākhyātam /
GSP33nysu__2u:4045: tathāpyalpāctarasya pūrvanipātamanusṛtya pravṛttaṃ sūtramanugacchatā kramo bhagnaḥ / *6,24*
GSP33nysu__2u:4046: nanu ca pṛthivyādyabhimāninya iti vākyaṃ kathamupādeyam 'ātmani caivaṃ vicitrāśca hi',
GSP33nysu__2u:4061: ye tu mīmāṃsakaṃmanyā vigrahavatī devatāṃ na sahante te 'pyanenaiva nirastā bhavanti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4064: anupalambhaḥ anekatra yugapatsannidhānaṃ ca śaktiviśeṣādupapadyate piśācādivat /
GSP33nysu__2u:4069: ityuktvā tatrāpi vipratipannaṃ prati“api lokaḥ'; iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4072: naca cetano muktaḥ pralīno vā tadvācyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4103: yadvā śāstroktavastuno 'pi śāstraliṅgato 'dhigatisambhavāttatra śabdasya vyutpattiryujyata iti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__2u:4108: yadvā śāstraṃ taistaiḥ praṇītaṃ tatsadbhāve liṅgam /
GSP33nysu__2u:4110: tataśca vacanaliṅgānumite vaktari vṛddhairanyānprati mṛdādiśabdāḥ śakyavyutpādanāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4119: yathā khalu loke yathā mudgastathā mudgaparṇī,
GSP33nysu__2u:4123: tathā yaḥ pāśahastatvādimānso 'bādiśabdārtha iti vyutpādanaṃ suvacana(kara)meva /
GSP33nysu__2u:4128: tataścaivaṃ vedaprāmāṇyamākṣipato 'tīndriyātharvyavahāramātravilayaprasaṅga iti sūcayituṃ śāstroktavastunaśceti sāmānyenoktam / *6,36*
GSP33nysu__2u:4130: sākṣātkṛte tu mṛdādāveva prabalā tataśca devatānāṃ mukhyapratipādyatvamityayuktam /

GSP33nysu__2u:4139: nahi vyutpattiviṣayasya parokṣatvamaparokṣatvaṃ ca vyutpatterdairbalye prābalye ca kāraṇam /

GSP33nysu__2u:4168: tadyadi yuktyantarasyāpi syāttadā kuto na bādhakateti /

GSP33nysu__2u:4179: asad iti cen na pratiṣedhamātratvāt / BBs_2,1.7 /
GSP33nysu__2u:4183: yatra yadā vedasya vākyayutā yuktirvirodhinī syāt,

GSP33nysu__2u:4189: sati taddṛṣṭāntena brahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatvābhidhāyakasyāpi vedasya vedatvādaprāmāṇye
GSP33nysu__2u:4191: siddhāntastu yuktivadvedasyāpyapauruṣeyatvena dṛḍhatvāt vāstavavirodhasyānupapatteḥ aviruddhātharkalpanopapatteḥ nāprāmāṇyamiti / *6,42*
GSP33nysu__2u:4192: iha punarvedavākyāntarasaṃvādena sudṛḍhayā yuktyā viruddhatvādbrahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatvābhidhātrīṇāṃ
GSP33nysu__2u:4193: śrutīnāmeva tatra prāmāṇyānupapattau prathamādhyāyoktavastunirṇayo na bhavediti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4195: pūrvapakṣiṇotprekṣitābhyaḥ śrutisahitayuktibhyo 'pi prabalānāṃ tadvirodhiyuktīnāṃ sadbhāvāttadviruddhānāṃ pūrvapakṣaśrutiyuktīnāmaprāmāṇyādupapannataraḥ prāgukto 'rtha iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4198: nanvevaṃ sati śrutīnāṃ śrutiyuktivirodhaparihāro 'syādhikaraṇasyārtha ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:4206: nanu śrutiyuktibhyāṃ pūrvapakṣite kathaṃ prabalayuktimātrāśrayeṇa siddhāntaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4211: tathā pūrvapakṣāgamāpekṣayā virodhyāgamasya ca bāhulyaṃ kathaṃ nirṇayaṃ na kuryāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:4212: pūrvapakṣyutprekṣitayuktyāgamābhyāṃ prabalau virodhiyuktyāgamau tadbādhayā vastuvyavasthāṃ kuruta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4218: tadidamudāharaṇaniṣṭhaṃ vyutpādayituṃ pūrvapakṣamanuvadati sūtrakāraḥ- asaditi cediti //
GSP33nysu__2u:4255: īśvarādīnāṃ pralaye 'sattvasiddhau prāgabhāvasya kāraṇatvamātrasādhane 'pi tasyaiva kāraṇatvamiti siddhayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:4256: nanu ca yatkāryaṃ tatsakartṛkamiti niyamānmahadādikartṛtveneśvaro 'vaśyamaṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ / na /
GSP33nysu__2u:4274: tathāpi prāgabhāvasyaiva kāraṇatvaṃ kartṛtvaṃ ca na kvāpyupalabdhamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:4288: iha prathamāṃ vṛttimabhipretya neti siddhāntāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe(vyākhyāti)- asaditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:4329: asat kāryaṃ yathā dṛṣṭaṃ vastutvāt kāraṇaṃ tathā /
GSP33nysu__2u:4332: yathā pralaye 'sat pramitaṃ tathā vastutvādbhāvatvātkāraṇaṃ kāraṇatvena siddhāntināṅgīkṛtamīśvarādikamapi(miti)
GSP33nysu__2u:4337: prāgabhāvasya niyatapūrvabhāvitvena viśvakāraṇatvaṃ siddhayan kartṛtayaiva setsyatīti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:4338: tadidaṃ pratyanumānaparāhatamityāśayavān pratiṣedhamātratvaditi sautraṃ hetuṃ vyākuvarn sādhyamadhyāharati- niṣedheti //
GSP33nysu__2u:4342: vipratipanno 'bhāvo na kartā pratiṣedhamātratvāt niṣedhaikasvarūpatvāt sampratipannaghaṭābhāvavaditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:4345: anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ kulālādeḥ kartṛtvaniścaye tu abhāvasya tatkalpakābhāvāt / *6,65*
GSP33nysu__2u:4348: tathāca ghaṭādyabhāvasyākartṛtve 'pi pralayakālīno 'bhāvaḥ kartā bhaviṣyatītyataḥ kartṛtvaniṣedhaikasvarūpatvayovirredhaṃ sphorayituṃ kartṛtvasvarūpamāha- buddhīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:4352: vṛkṣeṇa sthīyata ityādau kartṛtvaṃ pāribhāṣikaṃ na tu svābhāvikamiti hi sarve 'pi pratipannāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4366: tato vyāpyaṃ kartṛtvamapi na sambhavatyeveti kathaṃ kartṛtvaniṣedhaikasvarūpatvayorna virodha iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4376: ataḥ pratiṣedhatvādityetāvatākartṛtvavyabhicārābhāvātsūtre mātragrahaṇaṃ vyākhyāne 'pyekagrahaṇaṃ vyarthamityata āha- pratiṣedheti //
GSP33nysu__2u:4386: nanu kulālāderbhāvasya kathaṃ pratiṣedhātmakatvamityata āha- abhāveti //

GSP33nysu__2u:4396: yaśca pratiṣedhātmako 'nyonyābhāvo na tasya kartṛtvamittaya āha- dharmeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:4404: astvevaṃ pratiṣedhatvasya kulālādau vyabhicārastathāpi kathaṃ mātragrahaṇasya sārthakyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:4418: pakṣīkṛte abhāve prameyatvādidharmāḥ santi na vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:4424: anyathā pañcaiva bhāvāstadatirikto 'bhāva iti kalpanāyāṃ samavāyāderapi bhāvatvaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:4427: tathāca yathā kulālādervipakṣasya vidhiniṣedhātmakatvena pratiṣedhamātratvābhāvastathā pakṣīkṛthābhāvasyāpi (dharmadvārā vidhirūpasya)
GSP33nysu__2u:4430: ghaṭābhāvasyāpi dharmadvārā vidhirūpasya pratiṣedhamātratvābhāvādityata āha- abhāvasya ceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:4433: yadyapyabhāvasya pakṣīkṛtasya dṛṣṭāntīkṛtasya ca bhāvaḥ prameyatvādidharmo 'sti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4445: syādayaṃ svarūpāsiddhayādidoṣo yadyatra pratiṣedhamātraśabdena kevalapratiṣedhatvaṃ vivakṣitaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:4465: icchāprayatnādirūpāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ kartṛtāparanāmikāyāḥ vyāpikā buddhiḥ abhāvādvayāvṛttā tāmapi vyāvartayatītyuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:4469: dvividhaṃ hi prameyam svatantraṃ paratantraṃ ca /
GSP33nysu__2u:4487: ṭīkākārastu prameyatvādibhāvadharmāṅgīkāre buddhirapi tathā kinna syāditi śaṅkāvakāśādihoktamityāhuḥ / *6,80*
GSP33nysu__2u:4502: nahi ghaṭaḥ svayaṃ svasyaiva dharmo bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:4506: yo hi viśiṣṭate vyavacchidyate sa tasya dharmī /
GSP33nysu__2u:4510: anyathā ghaṭaḥ paṭo na bhavatītyabhāvaḥ prameya iti ca vyavahārānupapatteḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4518: saguṇanirguṇatvena nityānityatvena vā viruddhasvabhāvayorapi guṇaguṇinordharmyāditvasya darśanāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:4523: tadevamasambaddhayorapi vilakṣaṇasvabhāvayorapi bhāvābhāvayorabhede 'pi viśeṣaśaktyā viśeṣyaviśeṣaṇatālakṣaṇo dharmidharmabhāvo yukta eveti
GSP33nysu__2u:4539: tathāpyatra padārthasārthe yaḥ piṇḍo vidhidharmiko ghaṭādiḥ sa bhāvo,
GSP33nysu__2u:4540: yastu niṣedhadharmikaḥ prāgabhāvādiḥ so 'bhāva iti vyavasthopapadyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:4543: yaḥ prathamaṃ vidhitayā parapratikṣeparūpatāṃ vinā pratīyate sa ghaṭādirbhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4544: yastu niṣedhatayā parapratikṣepeṇa pratīyate prāgabhāvādiḥ so 'bhāva ityuttarārdhenaikavākyatayā yojyam / *6,87*
GSP33nysu__2u:4545: ghaṭo hi prathamaṃ vidhitvena dharmirūpeṇa pratīto 'nantaraṃ paṭo na bhavatīti paṭaniṣedhātmatayā pratīyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:4547: prathamaṃ niṣedhatvena dharmisvarūpeṇāvagato 'nantaraṃ prameya iti vidhitayā pratīyata iti sakalapratipattṛsiddhamiti bahuvacanahiśabdābhyāṃ dyotayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:4551: idānīmasatkāryaṃ yathā dṛṣṭamityanumānaṃ viśeṣato nirācikīrṣustatprastāvanāya asūtrayatsūtrakāraḥ oṃ apītau tadvatprasaṅgādasamañjasamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4558: na hīśvarādau sati tatparityāgenābhāvasya jagatkartṛtvamavadhārayituṃ śakyamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4560: bhāvatvāt ghaṭavadityanumāneneśvarādeḥ sarvasya pralaye 'bhāvābhyupagamādityatroktaṃ sūtrakṛtā“na tu dṛṣṭāntabhāvāt'; iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4569: sarvanāśeṣvapi sadā śiṣṭatvād yasya kasya nuḥ /

GSP33nysu__2u:4602: anaikāntikatvaṃ hi pramite vipakṣe hetuvṛttau satyāṃ(hetuvṛttyā) vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:4620: atha kāryavināśa eva pralayastathāpīśvarābhāvasya tena sambandhābhāvādīśvarādikaṃ pralaye 'saditi pratijñārthānupapattiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4644: ato dharmādharmādhiṣṭhātṛtvenāpi naraḥ paramapuruṣo laye svīkārya iti / *6,103*
GSP33nysu__2u:4645: nanu pralaye bhāvamātrasyāsattvamabhyupagacchato mama tadā dharmādharmāvapi na sta evetyāśrayāsiddhiriti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4647: kiṃ dharmādharmasaṃjñitamadṛṣṭamasti kāryamātrasya kāraṇaṃ ca bhavatītyabhyupagamya pralaye tadabhāvo 'bhīdhīyate,
GSP33nysu__2u:4651: anāditvaṃ vinādṛṣṭaṃ kathaṃ syāt kāraṇaṃ kvacit // MAnuv_2,1.77ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:4654: yadyadṛṣṭaṃ pralaye na syāttadā'dikālīnasya kāryasya kāraṇaṃ na syāt /

GSP33nysu__2u:4669: vinādṛṣṭaṃ kvacididānīntane 'pi kārye kāraṇaṃ kathaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:4674: tadādikāle janimadadṛṣṭaṃ tataḥ pūrvādṛṣṭādutpadyate na veti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4676: pūrvādṛṣṭāt parādṛṣṭaṃ yadi naivottaraṃ kutaḥ // MAnuv_2,1.77cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:4679: evaṃ tarhi taduttaramādikāle janimadadṛṣṭaṃ naivāsmābhiḥ pakṣīkriyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:4680: kintu tatkāraṇaṃ pralayakālīnaṃ pūrvādṛṣṭameveti kuta āśrayāsiddhiriti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4688: kiṃ tarhyādikāle janimato mahadādikāraṇādadṛṣṭādanyadevāto noktadoṣa ityāśaṅkāmutthāpya dūṣayati- pūrveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:4694: astu tarhyadṛṣṭaṃ kāraṇameva na bhavatīti dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ,
GSP33nysu__2u:4698: adṛṣṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ no cellaye mānaṃ ca kiṃ bhavet // MAnuv_2,1.78ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:4701: tadā laye ca kiṃ mānaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__2u:4711: vartamānabrahmāṇḍaparamāṇavaḥ pūrvamutpāditasajātīyasantānāntarāḥ nityatve sati tadārambhakatvāt pradīpaparamāṇuvat /
GSP33nysu__2u:4713: sarva eva paramāṇavaḥ kadācitsamagropādeyaprabandhaśūnyāḥ ārambhakatvāt naṣṭapavanārambhakaparamāṇuvat /
GSP33nysu__2u:4716: evaṃ tarhi dharmādharmāvapi svarūpato viprakṛṣṭatvādanupalabhyamānāvapi devadattaśarīrādikaṃ
GSP33nysu__2u:4731: devadattaviśeṣaguṇajanyatayā vināpi ākāśāderiveśvarecchayā devadattasya bhogahetutā sambhavatītyaprayojakatā ca /
GSP33nysu__2u:4741: vimato brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇapūrvako brāhmaṇatvātsammatavadityādinā satpratipakṣaṃ tāvaduktānumānajātam /
GSP33nysu__2u:4753: kiñca prathamaprayoge viśvaśabdena kiṃ brahmāṇḍamabhipreyate sakalakāryāṇi vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:4762: yathā hīdānīntanānāṃ dahanapavanasantānānāṃ krameṇāstamaye 'pi na pralayastathā tarugiriśarīrādisantānānāmapi kramārambhasiddhāvapyavayaviśūnyasamayā siddheḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4774: pañcame 'pi kiṃ bhūgolakā eva santānaśabdenocyante tadatirikto vā kaścit /
GSP33nysu__2u:4784: evaṃ pralaye jīveśvarasadbhāvaṃ sādhayatā dharmādisattvamapi sādhitamiti na pralaye bhāvamātrāsattvasādhanaṃ yuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:4785: evam ādikāryaṃ pakṣīkṛtya sopādānatvasādhane prakṛtyādisiddhirapi draṣṭavyeti / *6,135*
GSP33nysu__2u:4789: iti sūtrasya vṛttyantaramabhipretya cetanakartṛkatve anumānamāha- utpattīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:4790: utpattināśakārī hi buddhimān dṛśyate kvacit // MAnuv_2,1.78cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:4791: taddṛṣṭāntena sarvatra kartā kiṃ nānumīyate // MAnuv_2,1.79ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:4811: yadvā kecitkāraṇasya bījādeḥ pradhvaṃsenāṅkurādeḥ janmadarśanāttantvādināśena paṭādināśadaśarnācca pradhvaṃsābhāvasyaiva jagajjanmavināśakartṛtvamāsthitāḥ
GSP33nysu__2u:4830: tato bhavatīśvare mānamiti na kaścidvirodha iti / *6,140*
GSP33nysu__2u:4832: tadetanmatāntareṇākṣipya samādadhatsūtram oṃ tarkāpratiṣṭhānādapyanyathānumeyamiti cedevamapyanirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ oṃ iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:4834: nāyamanumānāvaṣṭambhena pūvarpakṣaḥ pramāṇena ca siddhānto bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:4857: tarkāpratiṣṭhānād apy anyathānumeyam iti ced evam apy anirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ / BBs_2,1.11 /
GSP33nysu__2u:4858: āgamānugrahābhāve na tarkaḥ syāt pratiṣṭhitaḥ // MAnuv_2,1.80ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:4864: yataḥ pramāṇānugrahābhāve tarko na pratiṣṭhitaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:4869: ādyaṃ tu kathaṃ svayamadṛḍhabhūmikaṃ paraṃ pratirundhyāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:4875: yada tūbhayoḥ api pramāṇamūlatvasandehaḥ tadāstu pratirodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4889: yastvetāṃ vyavasthāmanabhyupagamya sarvatrāpi pratipakṣasyāstyavakāśa iti sarvamanumānamapramāṇamiti ca manyate tasya sūtrārūḍhamuttaramāha- anyatheti //
GSP33nysu__2u:4890: anyathāsyāpratiṣṭhā ca svavācā vyāhataiva hi // MAnuv_2,1.80ef //
GSP33nysu__2u:4891: etenaivamupapādite 'pi yo naivaṃ manyate tasya svavacanavyāghātādanirmokṣaprasaṅga iti sūtrayojanā sūcitā /
GSP33nysu__2u:4893: sarvamanumānapramāṇaṃ pratipakṣapratihatatvāditi tvadīyamanumānaṃ pratipakṣaparāhataṃ cāpramāṇaṃ ca bhavati na vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:4902: yaccātra sūtre tarkāpratiṣṭhānāditi vākyaṃ bhittvā siddhāntatayaiva varṇayanti,
GSP33nysu__2u:4915: nahi jñānakaraṇasya pramāṇagṛhītavyāptyādimattvenāprāmāṇyakāraṇavyabhicārādiśaṅkākalaṅkavikalasya prāmāṇyaṃ nāstīti yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4917: anyathoktānabhyupagamenāsya pramāṇamūlasyāpyanumānasyāpratiṣṭhā svavācā vyāhataiva sūtrakṛtaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:4918: svayameva hi yuktyanusandhānarūpāṃ brahmamīmāṃsāmārabhya pramāṇamūlasyāpi tarkasyāprāmāṇyamabhidadhānaḥ sūtrakāro na vyāhatabhāṣī kathaṃ syāt
GSP33nysu__2u:4923: yato 'syāpi tarkasya prāmāṇye 'prāmāṇye vā asyāpratiṣṭhā ca sva(vācā)
GSP33nysu__2u:4924: vyāhataiveti nāyaṃ vākyabhedo yukta ityukta eva sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:4925: atra sūtram oṃ etena śiṣyā aparigrahā api vyākhyātā iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:4928: ityādinā prakṛtena śiṣyaiḥ kenacidaṃśena parigṛhītasya pradhānakāraṇavādasya nirākaraṇena
GSP33nysu__2u:4941: iha hi brahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatve vipratipattayo nirasyante /

GSP33nysu__2u:5742: kiñca prāgutpattessattve paṭasya kasmānnopalabdhiḥ kathaṃ cordhvamupalabdhiriti praśnasya upalabdhyanupalabdhi(anupalabdhyupalabdhi)
GSP33nysu__2u:5744: api ca prāgūrdhvaṃ ca tantūpalabdhau kathaṃ tanmātrasya sataḥ paṭasyānupalabdhiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:5747: tadā tāvapi tantūnāṃ vidyete na vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:5750: utpattināśavyavahārahetūvyaktyavyaktī yadi tantuṣvapi vidyete tadā sarvatrotpattināśayoranavasthā syāt /

GSP33nysu__2u:5765: etāvantaṃ kālamanutpanno ghaṭa idānīmutpanna iti tāvanna syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:5769: tathedānīmeva naṣṭo ghaṭa ityapi na syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:5783: sattāsamavāyāha ca sadā santāviti prāgvināśottaramapi janiḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:5785: iyaṃ sarvatrotpattivināśayoranavasthāvyavasthitiḥ anyathā samavāyasya janitvāṅgīkṛtāveva hi syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:5788: nanu janiḥ kiṃ prāk satī uta kārakavyāpārajanyā /
GSP33nysu__2u:5797: ghaṭo jāyate ghaṭajanma jāyata ityanayorekārthataiva hi laukikaparīkṣakasammatā /
GSP33nysu__2u:5800: nanu yadyasadutpadyeta sacca vinaśyeta tadā sarvatrotpattināśayoranavasthaiva syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:5806: yasya ca vināśakāraṇaṃ vidyate tatsadapi niruddhayate /
GSP33nysu__2u:5809: athavā syādiyamanavasthā yadyatyantāsadevotpadyate sanmātraṃ vinaśyatīti brūmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:5810: sadasadevotpadyata iti coktaṃ vināśakāraṇavadeva ca vinaśyatīti / *6,258*

GSP33nysu__2u:5825: yaduktaṃ śakto 'pi hīti yacca nityabheda itrata tadubhayaṃ śrutyāpi sādhayati- śakto 'pīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:5830: anyathā vinā kāraṇaistadvayatyāsena ca kartuṃ śakto 'pi niyataiḥ kāraṇaiḥ karotīcchayeti yojyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:5833: saṃsāriṇo hi viṣyigṛhītā iveśvarapreritā aniṣyamapi dhārakaprayatnenākṛtvā na sthātumīśate /
GSP33nysu__2u:5835: aśeṣataḥ prāgidānīṃ cokto na tu sannihita evetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:5840: asminnadhikaraṇe jīvakartṛtvapakṣaḥ śrutiprāpto vistarānnirākriyata iti bhāṣyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:5850: idaṃ hi sūtraṃ sarvathā kartṛtvaṃ nirākurvadupalabhyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:5854: ekadeśāṅgīkāre ca“atha yaḥ sa jīvaḥ sa nityo niravayavaḥ';
GSP33nysu__2u:5857: yena tasya vicitratve 'pi jīvasya niraṃśatvaṃ na vyāhanyeta /
GSP33nysu__2u:5858: tato vyāpakanivṛttyā vyāpyaṃ kartṛtvamapi vicitratve 'pi jīvasya niraṃśatvaṃ na vyāhanyeta /
GSP33nysu__2u:5859: tato vyāpakanivṛttyā vyāpyaṃ kartṛtvamapi nivartata iti khalvasya(tra)

GSP33nysu__2u:5865: nacaivaṃ parādhīnenāpi khalvanena kṛtsnena vā kartavyamekadeśena vā /

GSP33nysu__2u:5890: evamupodghātaprakriyayā viparyayaparyavasānopapattimuktvedānīṃ vivakṣitārthe sūtraṃ yojayati- yadīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:5891: yadi bhāgena kāryeṣu jīvaśaktiṃ na yojayet /

GSP33nysu__2u:5894: atra yadīśvarādhīnatayā kartā na syāditi vaktavye yadi bhāgenetyādivacanaṃ prasaṅgasphuṭīkaraṇārtham /
GSP33nysu__2u:5909: tatreśvarasyāpi kartṛtvāṅgīkāre kalpāgauravaṃ syādityato neśvarasya sarvakartṛtvamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:5911: nanu ca vyatireko gandhavaditi jīvānāmanekarūpatāṃ sūtrakāra eva vakṣyati /

GSP33nysu__2u:5914: tatkathamatra niravayavatvaśabdakopo vetyavādīditi gūḍhābhisandherāśaṅkāmaviditābhiprāyaiva pariharati- aṃśino hītyādinā //
GSP33nysu__2u:5916: aṃśino hi paṭādyā ye bhinnaireva parasparam /
GSP33nysu__2u:5917: aṃśairaṃśina ucyante naivameva hi cetanāḥ // MAnuv_2,1.96 //
GSP33nysu__2u:5920: bahusvarūpatākhyā tu teṣvastyeva hi sāṃśatā // MAnuv_2,1.98ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:5929: astyeva vakṣyamāṇānekasvarūpatāṇutvaṃ ca tadanyathānupapattisiddhā sāṃśatā ca /

GSP33nysu__2u:5933: ye paṭādyā aṃśinaḥ prasiddhāste parasparaṃ bhinnairevāṃśairaṃśinā ca vakṣyamāṇaprakāreṇa bhinnābhinnaireva na tvatyantābhinnaiḥ tantvādibhiraṃśairaṃśina ucyante /
GSP33nysu__2u:5936: yasmādevamataḥ prasiddhāṃśivaidharmyādevānekasvarūpeṣu tata eva sāṃśeṣvapyeteṣu cetaneṣvanaṃśina iti śrutirvartate /
GSP33nysu__2u:5939: nanu yadi bhedo nāsti kathaṃ tarhyanekatvaṃ tasyābhedavyāptatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:5947: kevalameva bhedena vinaiva teṣu bahusvarūpatā tayā khyāyamānā sāṃśatā cāsti /
GSP33nysu__2u:5952: atra jīvasyeti prakṛte 'pi yaccetanā iti sāmānyenoktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:5954: athavā yadyaṃśino jīvāstarhi paṭādivadeva syurityasyācetanatvamupādhimanena dyotayati / *6,281*
GSP33nysu__2u:5958: etadatiriktasya ceśvarakṛtyasyādarśanāditi pūrvapakṣiṇā svābhisandhāvudghāṭite satyāha- bahutveneti //
GSP33nysu__2u:5960: yadi naivaṃ niyamakṛd bhagavān puruṣottamaḥ // MAnuv_2,1.99ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:5961: yadi bhagavānpuruṣottama evaṃ na niyamakṛdbahutve 'pi bhedo jīveṣu mā bhūditi vyavasthāyāḥ kartā na syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:5962: tadā bahutvena hetunā jīveṣvapi bhinnatā bhavet /

GSP33nysu__2u:5974: tathā ca punaḥ saiva kṛtyā kṛtsnaprasaktirāskandeta /
GSP33nysu__2u:5975: atha jaḍeṣveva yatra bahutvaṃ tatra bheda iti niyamo na cetaneṣviti cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:5982: nahi svayameva svena sadvitīya iti yuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:5992: viśeṣaṃ nimittīkṛtya viruddhe apyabhedabahutve samāveśyābhedena niravayavatvaśabdakopamapāsya
GSP33nysu__2u:5995: nanvetatsarvaṃ jīvasāmarthyādināśakyasampādanaṃ kathaṃ bhagavānapi sampādayedityata āha- tasya tviti // *6,282*

GSP33nysu__2u:6103: tṛtīyasūtre śāstraṃ tatra pramāṇamabhidhāya tasyottaraprabandhena sāmānyato viśeṣataśca sakalajīvajaḍavyāvṛttavastuviṣayatā samarthitā /

GSP33nysu__2u:6173: yadyatra kartṛtvena prayojanavattvaṃ prasādhyāpūrṇatvasādhanaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo vivakṣitaṃ syāttadā prathamasūtramayuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:6175: atha kartā cetprayojanavānsyāt tathā cāpūrṇaḥ syādityāpādanaṃ vivakṣitam /
GSP33nysu__2u:6184: dvitīye tu kartṛtvānupapattiḥ tasya prayojanavyāptatvādityubhayathāpīśvarasya jagatsṛṣṭayādikartṛtvānupapattirityatra pūrvapakṣiṇo vivakṣitam
GSP33nysu__2u:6187: yadvā kartṛtvena prayojanasya tena cāpūrṇatvasya idaṃ sa dhanaṃ vivakṣitamutāpādanamiti siddhāntī vikalpyādyamādyena nirācaṣṭe /
GSP33nysu__2u:6191: athaiṣa eva parama ānando niraniṣyo niravadya iti śruteḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:6194: nanūktamatra lokavaditi sūtreṇa sādhanasyāpādanasya vā na kiñciddūṣaṇamudbhāvyata iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:6200: yathā loke jvalanapavanādīnāṃ tatheśasyāpi sadā sṛṣṭayādau kevalaṃ prayojanena vinā svabhāvādeva pravṛttiḥ pramiteti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:6208: nanu ca prekṣāvatpravṛttirna prayojanoddeśena vinopalabdhā iyaṃ ca prekṣāvatpravṛttiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:6209: ataḥ prayojanoddeśavatī syāditi sādhyamāpādyaṃ cetyata āha- aṅgeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:6215: yaduktamīśvarasya pravṛttiḥ prayojanena vinā svabhāvādeva pramiteti /
GSP33nysu__2u:6226: yathā loke saptadvīpāṃ medinīmadhitiṣṭhataḥ sampūṇarśauryavīryaparākramasyāpi mahārājasya kevalalīlaikaprayojanāḥ kandukādyārambhā dṛśyante
GSP33nysu__2u:6227: tathaiva parasyāpi brahmaṇaḥ svasaṅkalpamātrāvakḷptajagajjanmasthitidhvaṃsāderlīlaiva prayojanamiti tadetannirākaroti- krīḍāmiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:6228: krīḍāṃ prayojanaṃ kṛtvā sṛṣṭiḥ śrutivirodhinī // MAnuv_2,1.104ab //

GSP33nysu__2u:6233: iti kevalalīlaiva nirṇītā prabhuṇā svayam // MAnuv_2,1.104cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:6234: yata evaṃ“krīḍāṃ prayojanaṃ kṛtvā sṛṣṭiḥ śrutivirodhinī';
GSP33nysu__2u:6235: iti tasmāt śrutyanusāriṇā prabhuṇā svayaṃ sākṣātsṛṣṭaṃ kevalalīlaiva sṛṣṭayādipravṛttirnirṇītā līlākaivalyamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:6239: yasmāllīlāṃ prayojanaṃ kṛtvā sṛṣṭiḥ śrutivirodhinī tasmādetatsūtre kevalalīlaiva sūtrakṛtā nirṇītā vyākhyātā na punarlīlārtheti / *6,313*
GSP33nysu__2u:6247: dṛśyante hi kṛpālavaḥ svaprayojanamanuddiśya paraprayojanārthameva pravartamānāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:6257: viśeṣaṇaṃ, pravṛttisvabhāvatve sadā pravartetetyatiprasañjanaṃ ca pratyuktam / *6,314*
GSP33nysu__2u:6260: kā spṛhā na kāpīti śrutyā neti sūtrakāreṇa ca sarvathā prayojanoddeśasya nivāritatvādityata āha- ātmeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:6267: ata eva hi prayojanavattvāditi tatra hetumāha- anyathā naitaṃ brūyāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:6269: yadi neti sautrīpratijñā svaparaprayojanaviṣayā syāt tadā prayojanavattvāditi heturanaikāntikaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:6272: yo 'vāptayatprayojanaḥ sa svārthaṃ na taduddiśatīti vyāpteranavadyatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:6273: ataḥ prayojanavattvāditi hetuṃ brahmaṇaḥ sūtrakṛdātmaprayojanoddeśameva neti nivāritavān /
GSP33nysu__2u:6279: śrutirapyāptakāmasyeti hetugarbhaviśeṣaṇaṃ prayuñjānā'tmaprayojanaspṛhāmevākṣipati paraprayojanaspṛhāmabhyupaitīti jñāyata ityapi draṣṭavyam
GSP33nysu__2u:6296: tadarthaṃ buddhayaṅgīkāre tayaiva prayatnasya viṣayaniyamopapatteḥ kimantargaḍunecchayeti manvā(nyamā)
GSP33nysu__2u:6310: iti pariṇāmavādaṃ vivartavādaṃ kālādinimittavādaṃ cānyamatatvenoktvecchāmātramiti śrutyā svamatamucyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:6312: prabhoricchāmātrādhīnā sṛṣṭirna brahmapariṇāmo naca tadvivarto nāpi kālādinimitteti manyanta iti /

GSP33nysu__2u:6482: // oṃ vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvāttathā hi darśayati oṃ //

GSP33nysu__2u:6490: tatra tāvadādyena sūtreṇa karmādisāpekṣasya kartṛtvamabhyupetya vaiṣamyanairghaṇye parihṛte /

GSP33nysu__2u:6523: ato 'nyattu dvitīyaṃ vaiṣamyaṃ nairghṛṇyaṃ ca na vaiṣamyādināmakaṃ dūṣaṇarūpaṃ na bhavatīti yāvat /

GSP33nysu__2u:6573: tadanena svapakṣe pramāṇamabhidadhataiva parakīyayuktīnāṃ kālātyayāpadiṣṭatvaṃ svātantryābhāvopādhiduṣṭatvaṃ coktaṃ bhavatīti /

GSP33nysu__2u:6580: sakalajagajjanmādikāraṇe sakalaguṇaparipūrṇe samastāvadyagandhavidhure pare brahmaṇi viṣṇau samastaśrutisamanvayo yaḥ prathamādhyāye 'bhihitaḥ,
GSP33nysu__2u:6597: śrutyādisaṃvādinīnāṃ tanmūlānāṃ bahvīnāṃ ca yuktīnāṃ tatraiva nirākṛtatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:6598: kāścideva tatra nirastā na samastā iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:6607: evaṃ svapakṣasthāpane jāte parapakṣapratikṣepātharmayaṃ vāda ārabhyata iti /

GSP33nysu__2u:6618: tataśca vastuvikalpānupapatteranyataraparigrahe hetvabhāvāt brahmaiva jagatkāraṇamiti na niścetuṃ śakyate,

GSP33nysu__2u:6620: ato na kevalaṃ brahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatvamapabādhitumanumānaṃ notsahate /

GSP33nysu__2u:6951: evañca kāryāṇāṃ parasparaṃ bhede 'pi svasvakāraṇairabhedātkrameṇa mahāpralaye mūlakāraṇabhāvaṃ gatānāmabheda eva,

GSP33nysu__2u:6984: nanvevaṃ tarhi pratītisiddhaṃ bhoktṛtvamapare kathaṃ nābhyupayantītyata āha- prakṛteśceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:7000: yeṣāṃ puruṣo bhoktā teṣāṃ mokṣābhāvaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:7005: naca prakṛtipuruṣasaṃyogaḥ kadāpyapaiti yena puruṣasya mokṣaḥ syādityata āha- bhedagrahāditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:7009: tayoḥ prakṛtipuruṣayoḥ bhogināṃ puruṣasya bhogamabhyupagacchatāṃ mate /
GSP33nysu__2u:7011: prakṛtisaṃyogo hi puruṣasya na kevalaṃ bhogārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:7022: sati saṃyogo 'pi tayoḥ prayojanaṃ nāsti sargasya iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:7023: tathā“raṅgasya darśayitvā nivartate nartakī yathā nṛttāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:7024: puruṣasya tathā'tmānaṃ prakāśya vinivartate prakṛtiḥ'; iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:7027: uktaṃ ca“prakṛteḥ sukumārataraṃ na kiñcidastīti me matirbhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:7029: nanu ca yeṣāṃ mate puruṣasya bhoga eva nāsti teṣāṃ kathaṃ mokṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:7036: sa ca bhedagrahe sati nivartate saiva muktiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:7047: grāhayiṣyan vyatyayena vyācakṣāṇaḥ pravṛtteśceti sūtrasya pātanikārthamāha- īśasyeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:7053: nanvaprāmāṇikasyeśvarasyānabhyupagame kathamayuktatvamityataḥ pravṛtteśceti sūtrārthatayeśvare pramāṇamāha- cetaneti //
GSP33nysu__2u:7070: nacānyaścetanastathā bhavitumarhatīti sarvātiśayī puruṣa īśvara eva siddhayatīti /
GSP33nysu__2u:7096: asadakaraṇādityādibhiśca kiṃ kāryasya prākkaraṇavyāpārātsattvamātraṃ sādhyam utātyantasattvam /
GSP33nysu__2u:7107: asadutpattau kharaviṣāṇamapi kuto notpadyata iti cet /

GSP33nysu__2u:7110: ya(da)dyapi kāryeṇa kāraṇaṃ sambaddhaṃ tadupajanayati utāsambaddhameveti pṛṣṭam /
GSP33nysu__2u:7111: tatra kāraṇaśabdenopādānaṃ vā vivakṣitaṃ nimittaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:7144: tadevaṃ paṭādyutpattau cetanasya kuvindādeḥ pravṛtterupalambhāttaddṛṣṭāntena mahadādyutpatterapi
GSP33nysu__2u:7150: kintu sāṅkhayoktārthe pradhānasya svātantryeṇa jagatkāraṇatve kimapi pramāṇaṃ nāsti /

GSP33nysu__2u:7216: asadvilakṣaṇamityuktyā ca prāptasya sattvasya svayameva sadvilakṣaṇamiti niṣedhāt /

GSP33nysu__2u:7236: yadā tu doṣopetaṃ tadā doṣeṇa prāmāṇyajananaśaktau pratibaddhāyāṃ apramāṇajñānamevotpadyate /

GSP33nysu__2u:7320: svatantravṛttī racanā sā caivācetane kutaḥ // MAnuv_2,2.18ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:7327: nanvacetanatve 'pi pradhānasya svātantryeṇa pravṛttirastu ko virodhaḥ /

GSP33nysu__2u:7346: ityata svavyāghātaṃ tāvadupapādayituṃ svātantryaṃ vyākhyāti- sveccheti //

GSP33nysu__2u:7389: icchābhāve ca svecchānusāritvalakṣaṇaṃ svātantryaṃ dūrotsāritamiti bhāvaḥ / *7,104*
GSP33nysu__2u:7393: ātmā hi nityo nirvikāraścaitanyamātravapurna tasyecchādikartṛtvamāgantukaṃ sambhavati /

GSP33nysu__2u:7402: kathaṃ na sa ghaṭasya syān ... // MAnuv_2,2.21a //
GSP33nysu__2u:7404: yadi evamanubhava eva nāsti kintu vyavahāramātram,

GSP33nysu__2u:7425: tarhi sarvagatātmasannidhānaṃ ghaṭe 'pyastīti kathaṃ sa na ghaṭasya syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:7430: tarhi ghaṭo 'pi puruṣasyopakāraka iti kathaṃ sa na ghaṭasya syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:7436: sya vyavahāraścetkathaṃ sa na ghaṭasya syāt / *7,109*
GSP33nysu__2u:7437: kiñca yadi bhedāgrahādantaḥkaraṇadharma evecchā'tmani vyavahriyata ityaṅgīkriyate
GSP33nysu__2u:7438: tadā ghaṭasyāpyātmanā bhedāgrahātpṛthubudhnodarākāro 'hamiti vyavahāraḥ kathaṃ na
GSP33nysu__2u:7441: yadi bhedāgrahaḥ syāttadā kathaṃ sa bhedāgraho ghaṭasyātmanaśca na syāditi yojanā /
GSP33nysu__2u:7443: bhedāgrahaḥ kiṃ bhedagrahasya virodhī na veti /
GSP33nysu__2u:7444: neti pakṣe kathaṃ sa ghaṭasyātmanā paṭādinā vā na syādityuttaram / *7,110*
GSP33nysu__2u:7446: sa cāsti ghaṭa iti kutastatra bhedāgrahastatprayukto vyavahāro veti gūḍhābhisandhimajānato dvitīyapakṣamāśaṅkayāha- mana iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:7451: yadi bhedagraho bhedāgrahavirodhīti bhedena gṛhyamāṇe ghaṭe na bhedāgraha ityucyate,
GSP33nysu__2u:7452: tadā me mana iti manaso 'pi bhedena gṛhītatvānnātmanā bhedāgrahaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:7475: phalasya ca vṛkṣaśatpatataḥ kramavartinyākāśasaṃyoge kuṭhārādivyāpāre ca /
GSP33nysu__2u:7481: yugapanmāṇavako gacchati paṭhati panthānamīkṣate vahati ca kamaṇḍalum /

GSP33nysu__2u:7512: tasya ca tenaivātmano bhinnatayā grahaṇādbhedāgrahāsambhavenecchāmyahamīti na bhedāgrahanibandhano vyavahāra iti / *7,125*

GSP33nysu__2u:7526: idamiti viṣayoparāga indriyapranāḍikayā pariṇatibhedo darparasyeva malasambandhaḥ pāramārthikaḥ,
GSP33nysu__2u:7536: tata eva manaḥ kāma iti śrutirupapadyate /

GSP33nysu__2u:7587: anenācetanasya pradhānasya svātantryeṇa jagatkāraṇatvaṃ sādhayatāmanumānamapi svavacanavirodhaḥ pramāṇavirodhaścoktau bhavataḥ /

GSP33nysu__2u:7760: tatreśvaro 'ntaḥkaraṇaṃ spaṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra jñānecchāprayatnarūpā vṛttīḥ svecchājñānaprayatnairutpādya bāhyakaraṇāni cādhiṣṭhāya ghaṭādyutpādayati

GSP33nysu__2u:7773: kāmādyanuvādena khalviyaṃ vedavāk ātmopādānatvaṃ vaiśeṣikādimataprāptaṃ vārayituṃ teṣāṃ manorūpatvamācaṣṭe /

GSP33nysu__2u:7810: yatā kṛpālutvena bhavatāmīśvarasyetyata āha- svanāśārthaṃ ceti //

GSP33nysu__2u:7825: bhogārthā pravṛttiḥ prakṛteḥ svabhāva iti cet /

GSP33nysu__2u:7844: yena mayedaṃ kṛtaṃ sa evāhaṃ tatphalaṃ bhuñja iti kartṛtvabhoktṛtvayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyānubhavāttayadvaiyadhikaraṇyāṅgīkāre 'nubhavavirodha ityarthaḥ

GSP33nysu__2u:7887: evaṃ pradhānaṃ svayameva mahadādirūpeṇa pariṇamata ityāśaṅkā kilātra nirasyate /
