GSP33nysu__2u:7903: sāṅkhayamatasya nirastatvātkiṃ punarupanyāsenetyato 'sya matasya tato viśeṣaṃ tuśabdena sūcayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:7907: yadyapi seśvara ityanenaiveśvaro 'stīti brūta iti siddham /
GSP33nysu__2u:7909: ya īśvaro 'sti sa kṣetrānugrahaśaktimāneveti brūta iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:7913: sarvaśaktitvābhāve kiṃ tasyeśvaratvamityata uktam- svayambhāta iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:7928: eta eva pañca kleśāstantrāntare tamo moho mahāmohāḥ tāmisro 'ndhatāmisra iti vyavahriyante /
GSP33nysu__2u:7949: yadyupādānatvotpattiśaktimattvaṃ prakṛtipuruṣayoreva tadā kimīśvareṇānugrāhakeṇetyata āha- parjanyavaditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:7950: yathā hi pṛthivyāḥ kalamādibījānāṃ copādānatvabījatvaśaktī yadyapi svāyatte /
GSP33nysu__2u:7959: tatkiṃ niṣpramāṇaka eveśvaraḥ prakṛtyanugrāhako 'ṅgīkaraṇīya ityata uktam- smṛta iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:7964: prakṛtipuruṣayoḥ svāyattaśaktitvaṃ kuta ityata āha- pṛthivīvaditi // *7,186*
GSP33nysu__2u:7967: yathā pṛthivyāḥ svāyattopādanatvaśaktiḥ tathā tat tasmādupādānatvātpradhānamapi svāyattopādānatvaśaktimadanumeyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:7973: tatkathaṃ kṣetrānugrahaśaktimāneveśvara ityata āha- jīva iti //

GSP33nysu__2u:10597: tasmāddharmadharmāṇāmāśrayābhede 'vaśyamaṅgīkārye tatra dharmadharmyādivyavahārānyathānupapattyā viśeṣo 'ṅgīkaraṇīya iti yojyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:10609: kiñca dharmagatā dharmā yadi āśrayābhinnāstadā kiṃ dravyādigatāstitvādidharmairaparāddham /
GSP33nysu__2u:10612: tatasteṣāmeva dravyādyabhede sati punarvyavahārānyathānupapattyā dravyādiṣveva viśeṣasiddhiḥ (iti) / *7,560*
GSP33nysu__2u:10619: tato bhinnanimittatayopapadyamāno vyavahāro na viśeṣamākṣeptumalamityata āha- sāmānyasyāpīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10632: sadgotvaṃ caturviṃśatiguṇā rūpādrasaḥ pṛthagiti pratibhāsasya durapahnavatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10633: naca na sadgotvamityādi bādhakamasti yena pratītasyāpi parityāgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:10639: yadi gotvādau sattā syāttadā sattāyāmapi syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10646: pramāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ vṛttau na bhinnābhinnateyatā'; iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:10649: tasmātsāmānye sāmānyaṃ guṇe ca guṇaḥ anavasthābhayādeva nāṅgīkriyata ityeva vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:10653: tathāca yathā sā dūṣaṇaṃ tathā prakṛtāpi dūṣaṇameva /
GSP33nysu__2u:10654: na cetsāpi na syāditi sāmānyāderapi sāmānyādyaṅgīkāryaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10658: astyeva sāmānyasyāpi sāmānyaṃ guṇasyāpi guṇo nirbādhapratītisiddhatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10662: ... sa ca yadi nānavasthā kvacid bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.102cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:10665: caśabdātsāmānyasyāpi sāmānyaṃ yadyaṅgīkriyate tadā brūmo nānavasthā kvacidbhavediti / *7,566*
GSP33nysu__2u:10695: natvaniṣyāpattiheturityapi vaktuṃ śakyatvena kvacidaṅgīkṛtāpyanavasthā na dūṣaṇaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__2u:10700: api ca yo dharmadharmiṇorbhedaṃ samavāyaṃ cāṅgīkṛtyābhedaṃ viśeṣaṃ cāvajānāti tenānavasthāto bibhyatā guṇasāmānyayorguṇasāmānyapratītirevāpalapanīyā
GSP33nysu__2u:10703: abhedaṃ viśeṣaṃ cāṅgīkurvatāṃ tu nedaṃ dūṣaṇadvayamato 'pi tatpakṣapāta ityāśayavānāha- asmatpakṣa iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10714: ananyatve kathaṃ tadvṛttamiti tadavasthaḥ pratītivirodha ityata uktam- viśeṣato hi tadvanta iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10717: idānīṃ kvacidbhedābhedāvapi bhavata iti tadapavādamāha- bheda iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10721: kathaṃ tarhi satsvevāvayavādiṣu vinaśyantītyata āha- bheda iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10725: yatra satsvevāvayaveṣvavayavino 'bhāvaḥ sati guṇini guṇasyābhāvastatra bhedābhedāvityādi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:10726: anyathā yatrāvayavāvayavyādīnāṃ yugapadvināśastatra bhedābhedāvuktau na syātām /
GSP33nysu__2u:10728: satyapi tasminnasattvādityanena hetunāvayavyādīnāmavayavādibhyo bhedamātraṃ vā sādhyate 'tyantabhedo vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:10734: evaṃ satyapi dravye kecidguṇā asanto yathā pākajādayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:10746: tathā satyapi tasminnasattvasyāpi viśeṣaṇaiva nirvāhaḥ kriyatām /
GSP33nysu__2u:10754: nacāvacchedakena vinā bhedābhedabhūmeḥ saṅgrahaḥ syādityayāvadāśrayabhāvitvameva grāhyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:10755: tatrāpi viśeṣa eva saṅkaraṃ vārayiṣyatīti tu nirastam /
GSP33nysu__2u:10758: nanu anityadravyāśritā ekatvādayo 'pi guṇāḥ kiṃ bhedavantasteṣāmapi dravyakāryatayā taduttarakṣaṇabhāvitvāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:10769: kathaṃ viśeṣāśrayaṇe virodhaśāntirityata āha- virodha iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10773: tato viśeṣaṃ samāśrityaikatra bhedābhedau bhavata ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:10777: kvacidāśrayabhedo yathā madhurāyāṃ devadattasadbhāvaḥ srughne tadabhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:10779: kvacitpratiyogibhedo yathā gavayo goghaṭābhyāṃ sadṛśo visadṛśaśceti /
GSP33nysu__2u:10783: sarvatra viśeṣamāśritya virodhasyotsādayituṃ śakyatvādityata āha- dṛṣṭīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10794: asti ca bhedagrāhiṇī satyapi tasminnasattvāditi hetujanitā dṛṣṭiriti /
GSP33nysu__2u:10803: tathāpi kathaṃ virodhaśāntirityata āha- virodha iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10806: sahadarśane sati kathaṃ virodho vaktuṃ śakyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:10810: tato dṛṣṭe virodhastu sadbhirāpādyate katham // MAnuv_2,2.105 //
GSP33nysu__2u:10815: ataḥ sahadṛṣṭe bhedābhedalakṣaṇe vastudvaye virodhaḥ kathamucyeta /
GSP33nysu__2u:10818: hiśabdena śītoṣṇādau rūparasādau ca virodhāvirodhayordarśanaikapramāṇatvaṃ nidarśayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:10821: vaiśeṣikādayo hi saṃyogavibhāgaśabdātmaviśeṣaguṇānāṃ tatraiva tadaiva bhāvābhāvāvupetya
GSP33nysu__2u:10822: sahadarśanādvirodho nāstīti vadantaḥ punaratra sahadarśane 'pi virodhamudbhāvayantaḥ
GSP33nysu__2u:10823: svavyāhatabhāṣiṇaḥ svoktavismaraṇaśīlāḥ svadṛṣṭipakṣapātinaḥ kathaṃ santaḥ syuḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:10824: sarvatrāsahadṛṣṭayoryadi kaścidāgrahamātreṇa sahāvasthānaṃ manyate taṃ pratyeva virodhodbhāvanaṃ kriyate- nānyatheti // *7,581*
GSP33nysu__2u:10826: tatkiṃ sarveṣvapi dravyeṣūta keṣucidevetyapekṣāyāmāha- abhinna iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10827: abhinno bhagavān svena tadanyena vibhedavān // MAnuv_2,2.106ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:10831: tadanyena prakṛtijīvajaḍātmanā prapañcenetyevaṃ vyavasthitāveva bhedābhedau na tvekaviṣayāvityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:10832: ayāvaddravyabhāvidharmairbhedābhedau kuto na syātāmityata āha- nityā iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10845: satyeva dhamirṇi sāmastyenocchedavanto ye dharmāste ubhayarūpiṇo bhinnābhinnā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:10847: yadvā sāmastye dravyasyāvikalatve nāśābhāve 'pi ye ucchedina iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:10848: kiṃ svasadbhāvavelāyāmabhedino 'sadbhāvavelāyāṃ bhedina ityevaṃ kālabhedena bhedābhedāvityata uktam- bhāva iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10852: kuto bhinnābhinnā ityata āha- ta eveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10853: ... ta eva cocchedāt tadanye ca samastaśaḥ // MAnuv_2,2.107cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:10855: pratyakṣabalena ta eva dharmisvarūpabhūtā eva ucchedāt satyeva dharmiṇyasattvāddhetostadanye /
GSP33nysu__2u:10864: sarvadikṣvapi sambandhāditi yadaṃśataḥ saṃyoga ityuktaṃ tadayuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:10870: ataḥ pūrvapūrvasaṃyogānutpattāvuttarottarānutpattiprasaṅgādaṃśataḥ saṃyoga iti niyamo nopapadyata iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:10872: yadyapyaṃśata eva saṃyogo yadyapi cāṃśeṣvaṃśaparamparāyā aviśramastathāpyaṃśāṃśinorabhede naivāṃśasaṃyoga eva hi yasmādaṃśinaḥ saṃyogo 'to nānavastheti
GSP33nysu__2u:10874: syādiyamanavasthā yadi sarvatrāṃśata eva saṃyoga iti vadatāmasmākamaṃśinaḥ saṃyogoṃ'śasaṃyogenaiva jāyata ityabhiprāyaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10876: kintu yo yasya aṃśinaḥ saṃyogaḥ sa tadaṃśe vartate /
GSP33nysu__2u:10877: niraṃśasya tu saṃyogaḥ kva nāma vartatām /
GSP33nysu__2u:10878: ataḥ paramāṇvoḥ saṃyoge sati tadvṛttyarthamaṃśo 'ṅgīkaraṇīya iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:10891: atiprasaṅgo hi tadā syādyadi paṭavadghaṭāṃśo 'pi ghaṭādatyantabhinnaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10895: aṃśāvṛttitve sati ghaṭavṛttitvasādhane dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyavikalaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10897: yadi ghaṭasaṃyogo ghaṭāṃśe vartate tarhi ghaṭāṃśasaṃyogaḥ kva vartata iti cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:10898: anena (eva) nyāyena tadaṃśe so 'pi tadaṃśa iti brūmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:10901: evaṃ tarhi paramāṇuvṛttirapi saṃyogo ghaṭasaṃyogaḥ syāditi cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:10903: aṃśasaṃyoga eva hyaṃśinaḥ saṃyogo 'to nānavasthetyuktamanavasthāparihāraṃ vivṛṇoti- ekasminniti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10904: ekasmin jāta evānyaḥ saṃyogo jāyate yadi /
GSP33nysu__2u:10905: anavasthā tadaiva syāt saṃyogaikye bhavet kva sā // MAnuv_2,2.109 //
GSP33nysu__2u:10907: avayavaparamparāyā aviśramamabhyupagamyaikaikasminnavayavasaṃyoge jāta evānyo 'vayavasaṃyogo jāyata iti yadyaṅgīkurmastadaivānavasthā syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10909: avayavavṛtteḥ saṃyogādaparo 'vayavinaḥ saṃyogo nāstīti vāde tu,
GSP33nysu__2u:10923: kintu hastakarmaṇā janito hastavṛttiḥ saṃyoga eva hastakāyayorabhedātkāyasaṃyogo bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:10931: dvitantukāvayave tantau karmotpannaṃ tasya tantvantarādvibhāgaṃ karoti /
GSP33nysu__2u:10934: tata idānīṃ tantvorvartamāno vibhāgaḥ sakriyasyāvayavasya dvitantukasaṃyuktākāśādideśādvibhāgaṃ karotīti /
GSP33nysu__2u:10937: hastakarmaṇā janito hi vibhāgo hastakāyayorabhedāddhastakāyaguṇo bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:10938: ata eva vivādādhyāsito vibhāgo na karmāsamavāyikāraṇakaḥ karmaikārthāsamavetatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10942: anyathāṅgulikarmaṇāṅguleraṅgulyantarādeva vibhāgo bhavati ākāśādideśāttu vibhāgādeveti syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10956: ārabdhadravyamantyāvayavisparśarahitaṃ vinaśyadavasthaṃ vinaśyadavasthasaṃyogaṃ niṣphalārambhaṃ vijātīyaṃ ceti /
GSP33nysu__2u:10962: tantukarma na tantvantaravibhāgajanakaṃ karmatvāt sampratipannakarmavadityapi prayogasambhavāt tatra pramāṇabādha iti cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:10966: ākāśavibhāge vibhāgena kartavye karmaṇo nimittatvābhyupagamātsiddhasādhanamiti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:10968: etena vimataṃ karma dravyārambhakasaṃyogavirodhitadavirodhivibhāgajanakaṃ na bhavati karmatvāditi nirastam /
GSP33nysu__2u:10969: vimataṃ karma dravyārambhakānārambhakasaṃyogārambhakaṃ na bhavati karmatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10972: vyāptestantukarmaṇo gaganavibhāgajanakatve tantvantaravibhāgajanakatvaṃ na syāditi cennana /
GSP33nysu__2u:10974: vyāpterākāśadeśavibhāgājanakatve tantvantarādapi vibhāgajanakaṃ na syāditi pratiprasaṅgasambhavāt / *7,601*
GSP33nysu__2u:10975: kiñca tantorākāśavibhāgo yadi vibhāgajo na tu karmajastadā sakarmakasyevākarmakasyāpi kuto na syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:10981: evaṃ chalatvenānavasthāprasaṅgaṃ nirākṛtya prakārāntareṇa nirākaroti- aṃśa iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:10986: āpādake 'rthe dṛṣṭe sati sā anavasthitiḥ kā na dūṣaṇamiti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__2u:10988: yadyaṃśataḥ saṃyogaḥ syāttadānavasthā syāttataśca saṃyogābhāva evāpadyeta /
GSP33nysu__2u:10990: tasmānnāṃśataḥ saṃyoga iti hi viparyaye paryavasānaṃ kartavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:10995: atrāṃśataḥ saṃyoge na bhavatīti ko 'rtho yadyaṃśisaṃyogasyāṃśasaṃyogapūrvakatāniyamo nāstīti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11006: kimaṃśabhedena bhāvābhāvau dṛśyete uta ghaṭa eveti sandehāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11011: ta eva santu tarhi saṃyogāvābhāvāśrayāḥ kimaṃ(śi)
GSP33nysu__2u:11015: yadyaṃśago na saṃyogaḥ kāryeṣu prathimā katham // MAnuv_2,2.110cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:11017: yadi kāraṇānāṃ saṃyogastadaṃśavṛttirna syāttadā tadārabdheṣu kāryeṣu kāraṇāpekṣayā parimāṇotkarṣo na syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11023: praśithilatā ca saṃyogasya keṣucidaṃśeṣu vṛttiḥ keṣucidavṛttireva /
GSP33nysu__2u:11026: tataḥ saṃyogasyāṃśavṛttitvābhāve pracayo 'sau na bhavatīti kāraṇābhāvādutkṛṣṭaparimāṇotpādo na syāditi / *7,610*
GSP33nysu__2u:11028: prastute paramāṇau saṃyogasyāṃśavṛttitvābhāve nātiprasaṅga iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:11036: paramāṇuparimāṇādaṇodvaryaṇukasya mahattā parimāṇotkarṣo nāstīti vaco 'dbhutaṃ svavyāhataṃ pramāṇaviruddhaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11037: ayamāḍhyo 'yaṃ paramāḍhya itivadaṇuparamāṇuśabdābhyāmeva parimāṇatāratamyāvagatestadabhāvavacanaṃ svavyāhataṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:11043: tatkathaṃ paramāṇoḥ pracayābhāve dvayaṇuke parimāṇotkarṣānutpādāpādanamityata āha- aṇūnāmiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11045: paramāṇormahattvaṃ ca vinetyetad vacaḥ katham // MAnuv_2,2.111c-f //
GSP33nysu__2u:11047: dvayaṇukānāṃ parimāṇotkarṣāpekṣāṃ vinaiva saṃkhyāmātreṇa tryaṇuke sa parimāṇotkarṣo jāyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11048: tathā paramāṇormahattvaṃ parimāṇotkarṣaṃ vinā kevalasaṃkhyayā dvayaṇuke parimāṇotkarṣo jāyata ityetadvacaḥ kathaṃ ghaṭate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11051: atra parimāṇamātragrahaṇe kartavye prathimeti mahattvamiti coktirvisadṛśaparimāratvasyānapekṣāhetoḥ nirākaraṇaṃ smārayitumiti / *7,613*
GSP33nysu__2u:11052: aṃśāṃśinoratyantābhedo bhedābhedau ceti yaduktaṃ tadviśadayati- aṃśina iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11055: yathā gaganāderyāvadaṃśabhāvinoṃ'śinaḥ svāṃśairatyantābhedastathā paṭāderaṃśino 'pi sarvairaṃśaiḥ atyantābhedaḥ ekaikāṃśena tu bhidābhidā /
GSP33nysu__2u:11074: tathā vyatiṣaktatantava eva paṭastathāpi na paṭābhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11076: sa ca tebhyo na bhidyate iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11081: kathaṃ caikaikatantunābhedaḥ ekaikatra paṭabuddhayabhāvādityata āha- sarveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11091: kintu vyatiṣaṅge sati yattantūnāṃ viśiṣṭaṃ rūpam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11110: evaṃca guṇānāṃ guṇinaikye saṃyogādyāśrayānekadravyābhedo vā saṃyogādibhedo vā'padyeta /
GSP33nysu__2u:11112: tasya vyaktayabhede vyaktīnāmapyabhedaḥ sāmānyasya vā bhedaḥ prasajyetetyataḥ saṃyogavibhāgapṛthaktavānāṃ tāvadanekāśritatvaṃ nāstītyāha- saṃyogaśceti
GSP33nysu__2u:11113: saṃyogaśca vibhāgaśca bhedaścaiva pṛthak pṛthak // MAnuv_2,2.113ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:11122: tathātve caikaikasminneva saṃyuktādipratyayaprasaṅga ityata āha- anyonyeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11137: anyonyapratiyogena hetunā saṃyogādikamubhayorapi pṛthak pṛthageva hi dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11139: paṭo ghaṭena saṃyukto ghaṭādvibhakto ghaṭādbhinna iti paṭadharmaḥ saṃyogādigharṭapratiyogikatayā pratīyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11143: evaṃ ghaṭadharmaḥ saṃyogādiḥ paṭapratiyogitayopalabhyamāno na paṭadharmo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33nysu__2u:11147: yaddhi ghaṭātpaṭaḥ pṛthak paṭācca ghaṭaḥ pṛthagityanyonyapratiyogikatayā pratīyate tadekapṛthaktavaṃ pṛthak pṛthagevābhyupagamyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11148: yattu bhinnāvimau bhinnā ime iti pratīyate tadanekapṛthaktavamanekāśritameva pratiyogyanirūpyasyaikāśrita(śraya)
GSP33nysu__2u:11150: bhinnā iti tu bhedānāṃ samudāyo hi dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11153: ime bhinnā ityādipratītau bhedānāṃ samudāyo 'nekatvaṃ hi dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11157: yathā hi śuklā ime paṭā ityādipratītāvaneke paṭā anekāni ca tadviśeṣaṇāni śauklayānyavabhāsante /
GSP33nysu__2u:11158: tathā bhinnā ima ityādipratītāvapyaneke padārthā aneke ca bhedāḥ prakāśante ityabhyupagantavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11171: asyāmapi pratītāvito ghaṭādamuṣya paṭasyāmutaḥ paṭādamuṣya ghaṭasya bheda ityevaṃ dvidharmiko bhedo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11176: tena anumīyate 'syāṃ pratītāveka eva bhedo dvidharmiko dṛṣṭa iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11178: tatraikavacanaṃ yattad viprāṇāṃ bhojanaṃ yathā // MAnuv_2,2.115cd // *7,629*
GSP33nysu__2u:11186: paṭasya ca yādṛśena tantusamudāyenātyantābhedo 'bhihitaḥ sa eka eva /
GSP33nysu__2u:11189: ekaikena tantunā sarvaiścabhede 'pi bhedasyāpi vidyamānatvānnānyonyābhedaprasaktiriti svayamevohyatāmiti noktam / *7,631*
GSP33nysu__2u:11212: sāmānyamapīti vaktavye brāhmaṇatvāderayāvaddravyabhāvitvenāpi tatra parihāraḥ sambhavatīti jñāpayituṃ naratvādikamityuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11218: tathā naratvādikamapi tattanniyatadharmatayaiveyate dṛśyate iti pratyakṣamuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11244: tatra dharmatvahetovyarbhicāraḥ naca vācyaṃ sāmānyameva sādṛśyamataḥ pakṣe vyabhicāracodaneyamanupapanneti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11247: tatra yadi sādṛśyamaśvatvātparam tadā sarveṣāmapyaśvānāṃ rāsabhasādṛśyaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11252: dravyaguṇāvayavakarmavṛttīni sāmānyādeva hi sādṛśyanāmanyabhyupagacchāmo 'to na jātisaṅkaradoṣa iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:11255: tannirūpyaṃ ca sādṛśyamiti sphuṭo 'nayorbheda ityata āha- etādṛśaṃ ceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11256: etādṛśaṃ ca sādṛśyaṃ padārtheṣu pṛthak pṛthak // MAnuv_2,2.117ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:11258: bhavatu sādṛśyaṃ sāmānyato bhinnaṃ tathāpi tatpadārtheṣu pṛthak pṛthageveti na tena dharmatvahetorvyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11266: ekasmin sa vinaṣṭe 'pi yato 'nyatraiva dṛśyate // MAnuv_2,2.117cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:11269: tathāpi sa naratvalakṣaṇo dharmo 'nyatra narāntare dṛśyata eva yato 'to 'pi naratvādikamityuktena sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11270: yadvā vinaṣṭaṃ vināśaḥ saha vinaṣṭena vartata iti savinaṣṭaṃ tasminvināśavatīti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__2u:11271: athavā'śrayeṇa saha vinaṣṭaṃ savinaṣṭaṃ tasminniti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__2u:11280: nacaitadasti tasya nityatvādityata āha- kuta iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11283: naṣṭanarāśritasyāpi naratvasya punaḥ sattvaṃ na niṣpramāṇakaṃ pratyakṣasiddhatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11286: ata evānumānamapi bādhitaviṣayamityata āha- ekatva iti // *8,13*
GSP33nysu__2u:11296: evaṃ sāmānyādīnāṃ pratyāśrayaṃ bhede pratyakṣānumānānyuktavā śrutimapyāha- śrutirapīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11306: anyonyaṃ bhinnā dharmā yeṣāṃ te bhinnadharmāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11307: bhinnadharmā ityanenāśrayato 'pi bhedo 'bhihita iti śaṅkānirāsārthamuktam- svairiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11346: kāraṇaguṇebhya evotpadyante tata eva tadvadeveti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:11349: anyathā kāryadravyaṃ saṃyogavināśādeva vinaśyati kāryadravyatvāt dvayaṇukavadityādikamapi syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11361: sarveṣu gopiṇḍeṣu yadyanugatamekaṃ gotvasāmānyaṃ na syāt tadā tatra gośabdasaṅgatigrahaṇalakṣaṇā vyutpattirna syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11370: anugatagotve tu gośabdavṛttinimittatayopadeśādināvagate nāyaṃ doṣaḥ prāduṣyāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11372: nanu kathaṃ tarhi sāmānyarahiteṣu pṛthivyādiṣu bhūtamūrtādiśabdasaṅgatigrahaṇam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11410: tatra yadopadeśato vyutpadyate tadāyaṃ gaurityupadeśavākyaṃ vyāptigrāhakatayopayujyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11413: ayaṃ gaurityasyāyametatsadṛśāḥ sarve 'pi gośabdavācya ityartho vaktrā abhipreyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11418: kintvayaṃ caitatsadṛśāśca sarve gośabdavācyā iti vyāptiparaṃ tadā saṅgatigrahaṇottarakālaṃ gāmānayetyukte gośabdātsarvagopratipattiḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11419: abhīṣyagopratipattistu jāyate sā kathamiti taṭasthasya codyaṃ pariharati- tathāpīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11427: tarhi sannihitasarvagopratipattiḥ kuto na bhavati iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:11429: tathāpi yasya kasyacidekasya gopiṇḍasya pratipattiḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11438: tādṛśo 'yaṃ ca tacchabda iti jñāpayati sphuṭam // MAnuv_2,2.123ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:11440: yato vācakatvaśaktiḥ śabdasya sādṛśyagā sādṛśyasambandhinī sādṛśya(sya)
GSP33nysu__2u:11443: atastāṃ śaktiṃ tattadviṣayatayā sādṛśyaṃ sphuṭaṃ jñāpayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:11446: ayaṃ paridṛśyamāno yasmāttādṛśa upadeśakāle sannihitena piṇḍena sadṛśastasmāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11447: tacchabdaḥ sa śabdo yasya vācako 'sau tathoktaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11454: nahi sādṛśyaṃ śabdaśaktiviṣayatayā pravṛttinimittatayā vā abhyupagamyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11463: vyavahārādipūrvikāyāṃ tu vyutpattau bhūyovyavahārādidaśarne sādṛśyavyāpyatāvagamo bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:11464: tataścaitadvākyādināvagatavyāptirityanumīyate“ayaṃ gośabdavācyo bhavitumarhati tatsadṛśatvāt yastatsadṛśassa gośabdavācyastathā cāyaṃ tatsadṛśastasmādgośabdavācyaḥ'; iti / *8,49*
GSP33nysu__2u:11470: naca sāsnādimattvameva liṅgamastu kiṃ sādṛśyeneti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11474: naca vācyaṃ gosādṛśyamaśve 'pyastīti tatrāpi gośabdavācyatānumānaprasaṅga iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11477: tarhi sādṛśyaviśeṣa eva liṅgaṃ yo lakṣaṇabhūta iti vadāmaḥ / *8,52*
GSP33nysu__2u:11487: yastu manyate anugatasāmanyenaiva vyutpattyādikaṃ nānyatheti tasya bādhakamāha- jātitaścediti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11490: yadyanugatajātinimittaiva sarvatra vyutpattiḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvāvadhāraṇādikaṃ ca syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11493: jātiṣu jātyabhāvena tatra vyutpattyādikaṃ na syādityarthaḥ / *8,54*
GSP33nysu__2u:11494: yadi vaiyātyātkaścidbrūyāt“asti jātiṣvapi jātitvaṃ nāma jātistadvaśāttatra savarmupapadyate'; iti,
GSP33nysu__2u:11498: yadi tatra jātiṣvapi jātitvaṃ nāma jātiraṅgīkriyate tadānavasthitiḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11499: tathāhi gotvādijātiṣu jātiśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ yā jātitvaṃ nāma jātiḥ sā na tāvatsvarūpe vartate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11501: ataḥ svavyatiriktāsveva jātiṣu vartata iti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11502: tathāca svavyatiriktajātiṣu jātiśabdapravṛttāviyaṃ nimittaṃ syānna tu svarūpe 'pi /
GSP33nysu__2u:11503: atastasyāṃ tadvayatiriktāsu jātiṣvekasya jātiśabdasya pravṛttau nimittaṃ jātyantaramaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11517: yathā jātivijñānaṃ jātitvābhāvena dūṣitaṃ tathaiva vyaktivijñānaṃ vyaktīnāṃ vyaktiśabdavācyatvavijñānaṃ tannimittavyaktitvajātyabhāvena dūṣitam
GSP33nysu__2u:11522: mā bhūdvayatiriktaṃ vyaktitvaṃ sattaiva vyaktiśabdapravṛttau nimittaṃ bhaviṣyatīti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:11526: nanu śabdamātrasya jātinimittatvātsattayā parāparabhāvaśūnyamapi dravyaguṇakarmasu vyaktitvamastyevetyato noktadoṣa ityata āha- yadīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11529: tarhi tasya vyaktitvasyāpi viśeṣeṣu vyaktiṣu praveśaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11532: yaḥ śabdo 'nekavācakaḥ sa sarvo jātinimittaka iti svīkṛtya dravyaguṇakarmasu vyaktitvaṃ nāma jātiryadyaṅgīkriyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11533: tarhi tasyāmanyāsu ca jātiṣu jātiśabdapravṛttaye jātitvaṃ jātiraṅgīkartavyā syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11535: tarhi sā vyaktitvajātirapi jātitvajātiṃ prati vyaktiḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11536: naca sā svarūpe vartate tato dravyāditraye tasyāṃ ca vyaktiśabdapravṛttyarthamaparaṃ vyaktitvamaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11537: tatra punarjātiśabdapravṛttaye jātitvamabhyupagantavyamiti sāpi tadāśrayatayā vyaktiḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11545: yadyanugatasāmānyanibandhanaiva sarvatra vyutpattistadā sakalapadārthasvarūpaṃ svarūpaśabdavācyatayā kathaṃ jñāyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11548: nanu ca sarvasvarūpeṣvanugataṃ svarūpatvamaṅgīkriyate mayāto noktadoṣa ityata uktam“svarūpatvamapi yadyanugatamaṅgīkriyate tadā anavasthādidūṣitaṃ bhavati'; iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11550: sarveṣu svarūpeṣu yatsvarūpaśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ svarūpatvaṃ nāma sāmānyamabhyupagamyate,
GSP33nysu__2u:11554: atastasminnanyeṣu ca svarūpeṣu svarūpaśabdapravṛttaye 'nyatsvarūpatvaṃ nāma sāmānyamaṅgīkāryam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11563: yāvadanugatasāmānyanibandhanaiva sarvatra vyutpattiriti pakṣaṃ parityajya sāmānyahīne 'pi vyutpattimaṅgīkuryādityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11570: astu vā jātiṣu jātitvaṃ nāma jātiḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11584: samavāyādau svarūpameva sambandha ityato na kaściddoṣa ityāśaṅkāṃ pariharannanugatasamānyadūṣaṇamupasaṃharati- kalpaneti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11587: sarvatra vyāvṛttameva vācyaṃ śabdapravṛttau nimittaṃ ca /
GSP33nysu__2u:11588: vyutpattistu sādṛśyanibandhanetyekarūpakalpanena sarvasāmañjasye kvacidanugataṃ sāmānyaṃ nimittaṃ kvacidupādhiḥ kvacitsvarūpamevetyanekakalpane kalpanāgauravaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11592: evaṃ samavāyaṃ svarūpato nirākṛtyedānīṃ yatsamavāyasya sarvatraikatvaṃ nityatvaṃ ca“tattvaṃ bhāvena';
GSP33nysu__2u:11598: tadapi nirāgikīṣurādau tāvadekatvaṃ nirākartuṃ pīṭhamāracayati- aupādhiketi //
GSP33nysu__2u:11612: sa pācakayājakādiraupādhiko 'rthaḥ kiṃ pacanādyupādhipuruṣatatsambandhebhyo 'nanya utānya iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11630: yadi caupādhikaviśiṣṭādyamatiriktaṃ syāt tadā pācakamānayetyukte puruṣādyānayanaṃ na kriyetetyādyupapattivirodhaḥ / *8,70*
GSP33nysu__2u:11634: sā kimupādhisambandho vā puruṣasyaikatvaṃ vā svagato bhedo vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:11641: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyasambandhāvagāhyekaṃ vā vijñānamaviralamanekaṃ vā viśiṣṭamiti kaścit /
GSP33nysu__2u:11651: ... tadeva cedagnimattvaṃ kiṃ tatra bhaṇyate // MAnuv_2,2.126cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:11668: agnisaṃyogamātraṃ ced bhavet tat siddhasādhanam // MAnuv_2,2.127ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:11672: tat dhūmavattvādyanumānamagniparvatasaṃyogānāṃ samastānāṃ vyastānāmagninā saṃyogasya cāgnimacchabdavācyaviśiṣṭatve dhūmānumānaṃ siddhasādhanaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11675: astu tarhi parvatasyāgninā saṃyogo viśiṣṭarūpo 'gnimacchabdārtho 'numānasādhya ityantimaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11677: parvatamagnisaṃyogānāṃ samastānāṃ vyastānāmagnisaṃyogasya ca siddhatve 'pi parvatasyāgninā yaḥ saṃyogastasyānumānataḥ prāgasiddheriti śaṅkate- bhūdharasyeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11678: bhūdharasyāgnisaṃyogo yadi ṣaṣṭhayartha eva kaḥ // MAnuv_2,2.127cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:11682: parvatasyāgnisaṃyogasya ca siddhatve 'pi pavartasya yo 'gnisaṃyogaḥ sa na siddha
GSP33nysu__2u:11683: ityataḥ sa eva viśiṣṭo 'gnimacchabdārtho 'numānavedya iti vadatā parvatasyeti ṣaṣṭhayā
GSP33nysu__2u:11684: nirdiṣyaḥ sambandha eva viśiṣṭo 'gnimacchabdārtho 'numānavedya ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:11687: ataḥ ko 'tra sambandho vivakṣita iti praśnārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11692: saṃyogo hi guṇaḥ parvataśca guṇī guṇaguṇinośca samavāyaḥ sambandha iti prasiddhamiti hiśabdārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11700: yastantupaṭayoḥ samavāyaḥ sa eva hi parvatāgnisaṃyogayoḥ samavāyaḥ pareṇāṅgīkṛtaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11701: tantupaṭayoḥ samavāyaśca pratyakṣeṇa vānumānena vā siddha eveti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11703: yadyeka eva sarvatra samavāyaḥ syāttadā sarvānumānānāṃ siddhasādhanatā syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11704: yadyapi yāthārthyameva prāmāṇyaṃ tathāpi śabdavatparārthānumānasya parāpekṣayā pravṛttatvātsiddhasādhanatā doṣa eva /
GSP33nysu__2u:11709: kintu kenacidupahitaṃ vā viśiṣṭaṃ vopalakṣitaṃ veti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11723: saṃyogamātrasya siddhatve 'pyagnyādisaṃyogaḥ sādhya ityapi na vācyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11730: sa ca sarvatraika eva cetpunaḥ siddhasādhanataiva syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11732: nanu tantuṣu paṭādisamavāyaḥ parvatāgnisaṃyogādisamavāyaśca yadyapi svarūpeṇaika eva,
GSP33nysu__2u:11734: tataḥ siddhatve 'pi sādhyatvamupapadyata ityata āha- yadīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11737: yadi asya samavāyasya sādhyatvasiddhayarthamaupādhiko bheda iṣyate tadaikatvaṃ kuta iṣyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:11743: nanu svābhāvikamekatvaṃ svābhāvikenaiva bhedena viruddhayate na punaraupādhikena /
GSP33nysu__2u:11751: yathā tatraiva bhūtale tasyaiva ghaṭasya bhāvābhāvayoḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11755: yathā tatraiva bhūtale yadaikasya ghaṭasya bhāvastadaiva ghaṭāntarasyābhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11758: tatra tāvatsamavāye 'bhedabhedayornādyaṃ vidhātrayaṃ sambhavatīti parasyāpi sampratipannam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11763: hi yasmāttena vaiśeṣikādinānirvācyaṃ vastu neṣyamato 'sattvānirvācyatvābhāvādaupādhikasya svābhāvikasya ca satyatvātko viśeṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11764: aupādhikasyāpi svābhāvikavatsatyatvātpāramārthikatvāpāramārthikatvalakṣaṇasya virodhaśāntihetoḥ abhāvavādaupādhikatvādyuktayā na kiñcitkṛtaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ / *8,82*
GSP33nysu__2u:11765: iṣyate samavāyabhedasyānirvācyatvaṃ mayā cettadā ko doṣa iti cedapasiddhānta ityāha- māyeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11771: tathā samavāye 'pyaupādhiko bhedo na svābhāvikamabhedaṃ viruṇaddhītyata āha- upādhīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11774: upādhiśabdāttṛtīyāsamarthājjanyagamyayoḥ śeṣike ṭhaki kṛte sati aupādhikamiti bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:11778: evaṃ sati samavāyabhedasyaupādhikatvaṃ nāmopādhijanyatvaṃ vopādhigamyatvaṃ vā vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11782: upādhīnāmanantatve 'pi samavāyānantyaṃ kuta ityata āha- bhinnatvamiti //
GSP33nysu__2u:11789: kintu teṣu samavāyeṣvevopādhijanyaṃ tadavagamyaṃ vā bhinnatvamasti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11791: tathāpyaupādhikameva tadānantyamityuktasya kimāyātamityata āha- ka iti // *8,83*
GSP33nysu__2u:11795: aupādhikabhede ko viśeṣo yenāsāvabhedaṃ na viruṇaddhītyarthaḥ / *8,84*
GSP33nysu__2u:11797: nīlapaṭasadbhāve 'pi pītapaṭābhāva ityatra hi yadi viśiṣṭaviṣayau vidhiniṣedhau,
GSP33nysu__2u:11803: nahi pārthivaparamāṇau rūpādayo 'gnisaṃyogajā na tvāpyaparāmāṇurūpādaya iva svābhāvikā ityetāvatā rūpādirahito 'sau bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:11804: yadi ca viśeṣaṇaviṣayau tadā samavāye bhedo 'styeva /
GSP33nysu__2u:11805: sa tu sambandhibhirupādhibhiḥ kṛto na tvakṛtrima ityuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11815: nacaivaṃ bhedasyāsttvaprāptyā siddhasādhanatātādavasthyamiti vācyam yato 'vidyamāna evānyaḥ samavāyo 'dhigamyate tattadupādhineti brūmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11817: tathā taistaiḥ sambandhilakṣaṇopādhibhiravidyamānā evāneke samavāyāḥ pratīyante /
GSP33nysu__2u:11828: tathāpi tadgamakamavidyamānasamavāyasattāṃ pratipādayadanumānajātaṃ dahanaśaityānumānamiva bādhitaviṣayatayā na pramāṇaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__2u:11830: upādhīnvinā samavāyāvabhāsasya kvāpyabhāvātsarvatrāpi tasyāvidyamānataiva syādityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:11840: evameva tannityatvābhyupagame prāgasataḥ sattāsamavāyo janirduṣyā matā /
GSP33nysu__2u:11848: tatra yadi samavāyo nityaḥ syāttadā tallakṣaṇā ghaṭajaniḥ prākkulālādivyāpārādastīti tadarthasya tasya siddhasādhanatā syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11851: kṛtau tu prāksiddhasya sādhanamevāśakyamiti kulālādivyāpārasya niṣphalatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:11852: atha samavāyasya nityatve 'pi prāgasataḥ sattāsamavāyaḥ sādhyaḥ asto ko doṣa iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:11866: tatrāpyuktadoṣānuṣaṅgādityato viśiṣṭādinirūpaṇe tāvaddoṣābhāvaṃ svamate darśayati- asmaditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:11877: evaṃ yatra yatra viśeṣaṇasambandho yāvadviśeṣyabhāvī tatra tatra viśiṣṭaprakāro 'pi tathābhūto viśeṣyeṇātyantābhinno draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:11878: tathāpi viśeṣasya bhedapratinidheḥ sarvapadārtheṣvaṅgīkṛtatveneśvaraḥ sarvajña ityaparyāyaśabdapravṛttyādyanupapattidoṣo nāsti /
GSP33nysu__2u:11885: tatra yadyapi bhedābhedau vastunaḥ svarūpabhūtau tathāpyasmatpakṣe viśeṣasya sarvatrāṅgīkṛtatvato na saṅkaradoṣaḥ /

GSP33nysu__2u:14100: tantvādīnāṃ ca vicitrasvabhāvatayā pramāṇena siddhānāṃ na mṛdādikāryakāritvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14103: pramāṇena sattayā pramitānāṃ madhurādīnāṃ sadbuddhimātravailakṣaṇyakalpanā tyayuktaiva /
GSP33nysu__2u:14105: īśvarasya sarvakāraṇatve 'pi tantvādyapekṣā puruṣaprayatnādyapekṣā deśakālādiniyamaśca yujyata eva /
GSP33nysu__2u:14113: brahmādīnsṛṣṭayādāvīśvarasteṣu kṛpayāpekṣate parameśvaraniyogānuṣṭhāne teṣāṃ paramapuruṣārthalābhāditi jñāpayituṃ prasādādityuktam / *8,289*
GSP33nysu__2u:14115: satyatvasādhanāyopanyastasya pratyakṣasyānyathāsiddhimāśaṅkaya tatparihāratvena vaidharmyācca na svapnādivaditi sūtraṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP33nysu__2u:14123: vimataṃ gaganādikaṃ mithyā dṛśyatvāt svapnavadityanumānena viśvamithyātvasiddheḥ kathaṃ (tatsa)
GSP33nysu__2u:14134: nahi śabde 'vidyamānena cākṣuṣatvena śabdānityatvaṃ siddhayatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14139: dṛśyatvaṃ mithyā na cedatha ca dṛśyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:14153: yatra ca sādhakatvaṃ saṃmataṃ tatra mithyātve vipratipattito 'satyasya sādhakatvaṃ sādhyameva,
GSP33nysu__2u:14155: vipratipattau sādhakatvaṃ mithyātvaṃ vā sādhayiṣyāmīti cet /
GSP33nysu__2u:14168: nāpi sadvādī kadāpi sattvāsattvodāsīnena pramāṇena sādhyasiddhimaṅgīkuryāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:14170: evamasiddhivyabhicārābhyāmanumānaṃ nirākṛtya pramāṇabādhaṃ cāha- sattvaṃ ceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:14176: kintu yadanyadapi prapañcamithyātve 'numānaṃ jaḍatvaṃ vā paricchinnatvaṃ vā parairucyate tasyāpītyāha- anubhūtīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:14177: anubhūtivirodhena mithyātve mā na kācana // MAnuv_2,2.219ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:14200: kimato yadyevamavartamāno 'pi kālaḥ sākṣigocara ityata āha- taditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:14211: nahi viṣayasya traikālikābādhyatvamanantarbhāvya tatpratīteḥ prāmāṇyaṃ śakyagrahaṇam /
GSP33nysu__2u:14213: vyavasthāpayettadā śuktirajatādipratīterapi sa eva grāhaka iti tasyā api prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:14214: tathāca tadviṣayasyāpi rajatādestraikālikābādhyatvaṃ siddhayedityato dṛṣṭaśabdaṃ vyākhyāti- dṛḍheti //
GSP33nysu__2u:14215: dṛḍhadṛṣṭaṃ tu yad dṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭābhāsastato 'param // MAnuv_2,2.220ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:14226: tenāpyaṅgīkṛtaḥ samyak sa naḥ satyatvameva hi // MAnuv_2,2.220d-f //
GSP33nysu__2u:14229: saṃvṛtisatyasya tathātvenābhyupagatasya viśvasya viśeṣo vailakṣaṇyam avyabhicāravān kadācitkvacidapi sampratipannamithyābhāve avartamānaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14233: naḥ asmākaṃ mate viśvasya satyatvaṃ sādhayiṣyatīti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14235: atra tenāpi samyagaṅgīkṛta ityanena pakṣadharmatā samarthitā /
GSP33nysu__2u:14241: nanu ca śuktirajatādīnāṃ prāk śūnyatattvajñānācchuktyādijñānenaiva nivṛttiḥ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:14242: prapañcasya tu śūnyajñānena kadācinnivṛttirbhaviṣyatītyevaṃ mayā prātītikasāṃvṛtayoḥ vailakṣaṇyamaṅgīkṛtam /
GSP33nysu__2u:14253: nanvidaṃ kadācidbādhiṣyate dṛśyatvācchuktirajatādivadityanumānasya sattvātkathamatra pramāṇābhāva ityataḥ (tasyo)
GSP33nysu__2u:14255: ... pramā sā ca na bhavet svavirodhataḥ // MAnuv_2,2.221cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:14264: ato 'sya viśeṣasyāprāmāṇikatvenāṅgīkartumaśakyatve yo 'nyo viśeṣaḥ prāmāṇikaḥ pramāṇāvirodhī cāṅgīkartavyaḥ,
GSP33nysu__2u:14268: tathocyamāne pramāṇānāṃ tattvāvedakatvamatharkriyāyāḥ sattvamasati tadabhāva ityādi bahu saṃvidheyaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:14282: tacca vyāpakamanabhyupagamapramāṇābhāvābhyāṃ jagato vyāvartamānaṃ svavyāpyaṃ bādhyatvamiti vyāvartayati /
GSP33nysu__2u:14285: satyatvapratyakṣasya pratikūlatvena ca parotprekṣitaṃ tarkamapi nirākartumāśaṅkate- bheda iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:14293: yadi prapañco sāṃvṛto na syāttadā pratyakṣo 'pyasau na syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:14299: bhedo hi pratīyamāno ghaṭapaṭau bhinnāviti ghaṭapaṭayovirśeṣaṇatayā,
GSP33nysu__2u:14300: ghaṭapaṭayorbheda iti tābhyāṃ viśeṣyatayā vā pratyetavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14303: ghaṭātpaṭasya bheda iti vā ghaṭapratiyogitayā paṭadharmikatayā ca bhedagrahaṇameṣyavyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:14305: viśeṣyayorghaṭapaṭayorjñāne sati hi tadviśeṣaṇatayā bhedo jñātavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14306: nahi devadattādarśane daṇḍasya tadviśeṣaṇatayā darśanaṃ yujyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:14317: ato vāstavatve bhedasya pratītyanupapattau prapañcasyāpi tadāpatteravicāritaramaṇīyaḥ saṃvṛtibhaya evāyamaṅgīkaraṇīya iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:14325: yat yasmādbhedo vastunaḥ svarūpaṃ tasmāt tasya vastuno gra(he)
GSP33nysu__2u:14328: tathāca kvānyonyāśrayatvaṃ yena bhedo durgrahaḥ syāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:14331: yasmādvastuno grahe tasya bhedasyāgraho nāsti tasmādbhedo vastunaḥ svarūpamiti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14333: vimato bhedo ghaṭasvarūpaṃ bhavitumarhati ghaṭagrahe 'gṛhyamāṇatvarahitatvāt ghaṭasvarūpavadeveti /
GSP33nysu__2u:14334: yadi atra tasya grahe gṛhyamāṇatvādityevocyeta tadā ghaṭapaṭāviti ghaṭajñānena jñāyamānena paṭenānaikāntikatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:14336: nahi ghaṭagrahe gṛhyamāṇo 'pi paṭo ghaṭagrahe sarvathā gṛhyata eveti niyamo 'sti /
GSP33nysu__2u:14337: yajjñāne yatsarvathopalabhyate tattatsvarūpamiti vyāptāvucyamānāyāṃ daṇḍijñāne daṇḍo 'pyavaśyaṃ sphuratyeva /
GSP33nysu__2u:14339: kiñca viśiṣṭaṃ nāma viśeṣaṇasambandhanimitto viśeṣyasyākārabheda iti pī na viśiṣṭapratyaye viśeṣaṇasphuraṇamasti /
GSP33nysu__2u:14342: yadvā ghaṭabhedau pakṣīkṛtya niyamenānyatarapratītāvanyatarasya sphuraṇenānyonyābhinnatvaṃ sādhyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:14354: anyathāsyāmunā bheda iti vaktuṃ na yujyate // MAnuv_2,2.223cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:14356: yadi bhedo vastupratītau na pratīyeta tadāsyāmunā bheda ityuttarakālaṃ savikalpaka(vi)
GSP33nysu__2u:14367: na kevalaṃ vastudarśane bhedasphuraṇamanabhyupagacchato 'syāmunā bheda iti paścātkālīnaṃ savikalpakajñānaṃ tathā vyavahāraśca nopapadyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:14373: nantaraṃ smaryamāṇaro gṛhyamāṇo vā pratiyogī paṭo 'pi vinā bhedenopalabdhavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14375: tathā cottarakālaṃ svasmātsvayaṃ bhinna iti savikalpako bhedagrahaḥ syāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:14380: paṭādghaṭo bhinna ityeva hi savikalpikā pratītiranubhūyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:14382: ataḥ pratītivirodhādevaṃvidhaḥ savikalpakagraho nāṅgīkartumucita iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14383: kiñca yadi svasvātsvayaṃ bhinna iti savikalpako bhedagrahaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:14392: kadāpi kasyacidapi tathā vyavahārābhāvena viparītavyavahāreṇa ca sarvapratītisiddheriti /
GSP33nysu__2u:14406: tatra dhamirṇo bhedena pratipannasya vā pratiyogitā, anyathā vā /
GSP33nysu__2u:14409: ādye pratiyogisvarūpabhedapratītau dharmiṇaḥ pratiyogitāyāṃ sa eva nyāyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14412: vastuto 'nyonyapratiyogikayorghaṭapaṭasvarūpabhedayoḥ pratītayoḥ satorasati sādṛśyādau pratibandhake 'nyonyapratiyogikatayā viśiṣṭabhedapratītau bādhakābhāvāditi / *8,321*
GSP33nysu__2u:14413: evaṃ svamatena bhedapratītāvanyonyāśrayatvaṃ parihṛtya bhinnabhedavādināṃ parihāramāha- dharmitveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:14415: viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ ca tadbhāvaścaiva gṛhyate // MAnuv_2,2.225 //

GSP33nysu__2u:14453: ekasyāmeva nirvikalpikāyāṃ saṃvidi bhedasya bhedinośca yugapadavabhāsane sati tatraikaṃ bhedinamava(dhiṃ kṛtvai)
GSP33nysu__2u:14462: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvena grahaṇamapi na dharmipratiyogiprakārādbhidyata iti vaiśeṣikaparīkṣāyāmuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:14469: kimatra yadi dharmyādipratītyapekṣayā bhedaḥ pratīyeta tadānyonyāśrayatvaṃ syādi(tyā)

GSP33nysu__2u:14473: ... bhedaḥ kathaṃ grāhya iti yaḥ paripṛcchati /
GSP33nysu__2u:14485: bhedo durgraha iti pratijñāya tadupapattaye hīdamucyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:14486: anena ca yadi bhedo dharmyādipratītimapekṣya pratīyeta tadānyonyāśrayatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:14487: tathāca na pratīyetetyāpādanena pratīyate cāto na dharmyādigrahaṇāpekṣā tatpratītiriti labdhaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__2u:14491: kiṃ pareṇa kvāpi bhedo na gṛhītaḥ kiṃvā kvacidgṛhīta iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:14495: yadyanyatvaṃ kvāpi na gṛhītaṃ tadānyonyāśrayatvāpādanameva na śakyam /

GSP33nysu__2u:14514: sāṃvṛta iti yebhyastantubhyo jātasteṣāmeva kāraṇaṃ bha(va)viṣyatīti / *8,331*
GSP33nysu__2u:14515: nanvanenāsya tarkasya kiṃ dūṣaṇamuktaṃ syādityata āha- etādṛśasyeti //

GSP33nysu__2u:14534: tathā sattāvatkāraṇaṃ vā kāraṇe sattā vā /

GSP33nysu__2u:14550: nanvetadanyonyāśrayatvādikaṃ sūtrakṛtaiva kuto na nirākṛtamityata āha- taditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:14556: sadalameva pūrvapakṣivacanaṃ nirākartavyaṃ bhavati na nirdalam /

GSP33nysu__2u:14574: nanu nirviśeṣatvena bāhyalakṣaṇabhedābhāve 'pi satyajñānānantānandātmakatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ māyāvādināṅgīkṛtam /
GSP33nysu__2u:14591: yatpunaruktaṃ dṛśyatvasya satyatve tatraiva vyabhicāraprasaṅgāttasya mithyātvaṃ vācyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:14609: ata e(vai)tadviṣaye sadvādinaḥ kimapi kṛtyaṃ nāstyeva /
GSP33nysu__2u:14617: tadubhayaṃ sūtre na dṛśyata ityata āha- ceti //
GSP33nysu__2u:14622: nanvanuktasamuccayārthena caśabdenedaṃ dūṣaṇadvayaṃ sūcitamiti yathā vyākhyāyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:14633: bahusthaleṣu gṛhīteyaṃ vyāptirityato na vyabhicāramarhatīti pūrvapakṣiṇo 'bhimānaṃ sūcayituṃ sūtrakāreṇādipadaṃ prayuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:14634: tathāpi prayogavelāyāmeka eva dṛṣṭānta upādeyo 'nyathā'dhikyaṃ prasa(jyate)jyeteti /
GSP33nysu__2u:14652: nanu jñeyamapi rūpādikaṃ pratyakṣādisiddhaṃ tatkathaṃ vijñānameva tattvamityata āha- akhileti //
GSP33nysu__2u:14655: kuto jñeyasya jñānātmakatvamityata āha- prabhāsata iti //
GSP33nysu__2u:14657: tena prakāśamānatvasya jñānatvena vyāptau siddhāyāṃ nīlāderapi prakāśamānasya jñānatvaṃ siddhamityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14664: vijñānasantatīnāṃ bhedasya ekaikasyāpi santatau vijñānabhedasya ca vidyamānatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:14667: tenaiva vijñānasya sadvitīyatvāprāpternaikatvamupapadyata ityata āha- tatreti //
GSP33nysu__2u:14668: tatra santatibhedaśca svabhedo bheda eva ca /
GSP33nysu__2u:14689: kiṃ jñeyaṃ svarūpeṇāsadeva vijñāne samāropitaṃ vijñānātmaka(mityu)
GSP33nysu__2u:14690: mucyate, kiṃ vā paramārthasata eva jñeyasya jagato vijñānātmakatvaṃ bhedamātraṃ tvasaditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:14718: anumānavirodhaṃ cānumānasya pratipādayituṃ sūtram oṃ kṣaṇikatvācca oṃ //
GSP33nysu__2u:14731: atra kṣaṇikatvākṣaṇikatvalakṣaṇaviruddhadharmādhyāsaṃ bhedahetuṃ vadatā'ntarabāhyatvādiraneko viruddhadharmasaṃsarga upalakṣito boddhavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14732: evaṃ pratyekaṃ nirākṛtāni bauddhamatāni sādhāraṇadoṣeṇa dūṣayituṃ sūtram- oṃ savarthānupapatteśca oṃ //
GSP33nysu__2u:14771: te ca jīvāstikāyo dharmāstikāyo 'dharmāstikāyaḥ pudgalāstikāya ākāśāstikāya iti pañca /
GSP33nysu__2u:14772: atra ca mokṣopayoginaḥ sapta padārthā jīvājīvāsravabandhanirjarasaṃvaramokṣāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14799: atra saptabhaṅgitvanirāsārthaṃ naikasminnasambhavāditi sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe- naitaditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:14800: naitat padārtha ekasmin yuktaṃ dṛṣṭivirodhataḥ // MAnuv_2,2.237ab // *8,363*
GSP33nysu__2u:14812: nanvekāntadarśanasya mithyādṛṣṭitvena na tadvirodho 'sambhavamāhavatītyata āha- bhāveti //
GSP33nysu__2u:14814: tadrūpameva taditi niyamaḥ kena vāryate // MAnuv_2,2.237c-f //
GSP33nysu__2u:14820: athavā yena bhāvābhāvatayā rūpeṇeti sāmānādhikaraṇyena yojyam /
GSP33nysu__2u:14825: yadi dṛṣṭasya niyamasya nivārakamanekāntasādhakaṃ prabalapramāṇaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:14827: naca bādhakena vinā pratyayānāṃ mithyātvaṃ kalpayituṃ yuktamatiprasaṅgāditi /
GSP33nysu__2u:14832: sadvādino hi sattvaṃ viśvasya pramāṇaiḥ prātiṣṭhipastadanaṅgīkāre doṣāṃśca nyarūpayan /
GSP33nysu__2u:14834: tathānye 'pi svapakṣasādhanaṃ tadanabhyupagame bādhanaṃ ca kṛtavantaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14836: tvaṃ nāṅgīkriyate tadā tu tadupanyastaṃ pramāṇamuparudhyeta dūṣaṇaṃ cānuṣajyeta /
GSP33nysu__2u:14838: atastaddoṣaparihārārthaṃ tattatpramāṇānusaraṇārthaṃ ca tattadātmatā viśvasya mayā svīkṛtā /
GSP33nysu__2u:14850: sadvādino hi na kevalaṃ sattve pramāṇaṃ tadanaṅgīkāre ca dūṣaṇaṃ ca vyutpādya nivṛttāḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14852: evamasadvādino 'pi nāsattve pramāṇaṃ tadanabhyupagame bādhakaṃ cābhidhāyaivoparatā,
GSP33nysu__2u:14864: tathā cāṅgīkāraparityāgābhyāmubhayata ākṛṣṭo 'yaṃ kaṣṭāṃ daśāmāviṣyaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:14868: akramānekānte 'pi yena rūpeṇa nityatvaṃ tenaivānityatvamityādyanaṅgīkārānna virodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14869: tathāca saptabhaṅgayaṅgīkāriṇā mayā tāni pramāṇāni dūṣaṇāni ca vyavasthāpitāni bhavantīti noktadoṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:14881: kiñca sarvāṅgīkārapakṣe syādasti ca nāsti ceti pakṣātsyādasti syānnāstīti pakṣadvayaṃ na bhidyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:14889: aśeṣamāviruddhaṃ ca nirmānaṃ vyāhataṃ sadā // MAnuv_2,2.239 //
GSP33nysu__2u:14891: svavyāhatatvamityādyā doṣāḥ sarve bhavanti hi // MAnuv_2,2.240 //
GSP33nysu__2u:14893: aśeṣamāviruddhaṃ vadata ityasyopapādanaṃ vyavasthitayā sadasattayā pramāṇāptaniyamamatihāyeti /
GSP33nysu__2u:14897: akramānekānte 'pi rūpabhedenetyata uktam- sadā sarvaprakāraṃ vadata iti //

GSP33nysu__2u:17336: evaṃ vināśalakṣaṇaṃ bādhaṃ siddhavatkṛtya śaktirajatādau viyadādau ca bādhasyāsiddhirabhihitā /

GSP33nysu__2u:17352: kāryaṃ tu rajatādikamupādānavināśe svayameva vilīyata iti pareṣāṃ matam /

GSP33nysu__2u:17369: ghaṭāderapi mudgarābhighātādinaiva vināśo nādhiṣṭhānatattvajñāneneti pūrvoktaṃ smārayitumetaduktamiti hiśabdaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:17378: yadvā avidyāyā pravṛttasya tadupādānakasya hi vidyayā nivṛttiruktarūpopapadyate /

GSP33nysu__2u:17388: yadetāvantaṃ kālaṃ pratyabhāttannāsīnnāsti na bhaviṣyatīti traikālikasattvaniṣedharūpajñānaviṣayatā (yadi)
GSP33nysu__2u:17390: yadyapyevaṃvidhaṃ jñānaṃ bādha iti vaktavyaṃ tathāpi tasya rajatādisambandhitājñāpanārthaṃ jñānameyatetyuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:17403: yaccāsanna tatpratīyate yathā śaśaviṣāṇamiti pramāṇenāsattvavirahasya niścitatvāt /

GSP33nysu__2u:17418: asataḥ pratītirnāstīti niṣedhaṃ kurvatā kuto 'sataḥ pratītiraṅgīkāryetyata āha- niṣedho hīti //

GSP33nysu__2u:17443: evamanumānādīnāṃ pratyekaṃ dūṣaṇamabhidhāya sādhāraṇaṃ dūṣaṇamāha- pratyakṣāditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:17444: pratyakṣeṇa gaganādau sattvameva śuktirajatādau tvasattvameva niścīyate /

GSP33nysu__2u:17449: yadvā jīveśvarayorbhedo mithyā bhedatvādityādyanumānasya dūṣaṇāntaramāha- pratyakṣāditi //
GSP33nysu__2u:17457: nacāpratyakṣavastubhedaḥ pratyakṣasiddho dūre tatsatyatvamityata āha- śāstreti //

GSP33nysu__2u:17468: yastu śāstreṇeśvaraṃ na jānāti tena mā vimāyi tatpratiyogikaḥ svātmano bhedaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:17469: śāstrādviditeśvarasyaiva pratyakṣaṃ tataḥ svātmano bhede pramāṇamuktamiti /
GSP33nysu__2u:17470: tathāpi kathamanumānasya kālātyayāpadiṣṭatvaṃ bhedagrāhakasya pratyakṣasya prābalyānirūpaṇādityata āha- anubhūtīti // *8,559*
GSP33nysu__2u:17471: tatāpi kathamanumānasya kālātyayāpadiṣṭatvaṃ bhedagrāhakasya pratyakṣasya prābalyānirūpaṇādityata āha anubhūtīti /
GSP33nysu__2u:17482: atastadvirodhena kāraṇena jīvabrahmaṇorekatvaṃ nānumātuṃ śakyata iti /

GSP33nysu__2u:17485: sarvajño bhagavān viṣṇuḥ sarvaśaktiriti śrutaḥ // MAnuv_2,3.51ab //

GSP33nysu__2u:17499: yadyapi bhedaḥ pratyakṣasiddhastathāpi pratiyogino vaidharmyadaśarnaṃ pratyakṣasācivyamācaratīti na doṣaḥ /

GSP33nysu__2u:17503: tathāpi taṃ vihāyānyatreśvarābhedānumāne na pratyakṣabādha ityata uktam- sarvaireveti //

GSP33nysu__2u:17527: śrutyā hi yadi jīvamanūdya tasyeśvaraikyaṃ bodhyate tadā jīvagrāhakaṃ sākṣipratyakṣamupajīvyaṃ syāt /

GSP33nysu__2u:17552: brahmaṇyapi sambhavāditi pakṣadvayamatisphuṭadoṣatvādanirākṛtya tṛtīyaṃ dūṣayati- aprāmāṇyamiti //

GSP33nysu__2u:17594: samutthānavatā khalvanumānenāgamena vā virodhinā yaḥ sarvajña ityādyāgamasyāprāmāṇyasyeṣyavyam /

GSP33nysu__2u:17607: atrāpi tṛtīyādhyāye catutharpāde“tathānyepyāhuḥ sarvaṃ jñānaṃ dharmiṇi pramāṇaṃ prakāre tu viparyaya iti) /

GSP33nysu__2u:17630: nāpi virodhyuttarajñānatvena śuktirūpyamiti jñānānantaraṃ rajatamidamiti jñānasya darśanāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:17633: kintu yāvacchakti parīkṣitamuttaraṃ virodhyaparīkṣitasya pūrvasya bādhakaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:17635: na kevalaṃ bādhakābhāvasāmyādayaṃ vibhāgo na yuktaḥ kiṃ tarhītyata āha- eketi //

GSP33nysu__2u:17640: na punaḥ śuktirajatādijñānamiva svarūpamātre pramāṇaṃ viśiṣyākāre tvapramāṇamityanekavidhamityevaṃ
GSP33nysu__2u:17645: athavā yaḥ sarvajña ityādiśruterbrahmasvarūpamātre prāmāṇyamaprāmāṇyaṃ tu sārvajñādiviśiṣyākāra iti vadataḥ ko 'bhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:17646: kiṃ śuktirajatādijñānamivaikamevedaṃ jñānaṃ viṣayabhedena pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ ceti /

GSP33nysu__2u:17659: evaṃ bādhābhāvaparīkṣitatvasāmye 'pi śrautamekaṃ jñānadvayaṃ vāṅgīkṛtyāṃśataḥ prāmāṇyaprāmāṇye vadato 'tiprasaṅgamāha- nacediti //
GSP33nysu__2u:17660: tacchrautaṃ jñānaṃ dvayaṃ viśiṣyākāraṃ prati pramāṇaṃ na cettadātra viṣaye ekaṃ svarūpāṃśaṃ pratyapi pramāṇaṃ na bhavet /
GSP33nysu__2u:17663: yadvā tadvijñānamatra viṣaye ekaṃ viśiṣyākāraṃ prati pramāṇaṃ cettadā dvayaṃ pratyapi no bhavet /
GSP33nysu__2u:17666: jñānadvayāṅgīkāravāde tvatra jñānadvaye tadviśiṣyaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ na cettarhi jñānadvayamapi pramāṇaṃ na bhavet /
GSP33nysu__2u:17668: evamabhedānumānāgamau prati yaḥ sarvajña iti śruterniṣedhyasamarpakatvenopajīvyatvaṃ pratyuktam /

GSP33nysu__2u:17687: nahi brahmāpi sārvajñādinā vinā śakyaṃ dharmīkartum /

GSP33nysu__2u:17690: yo 'yaṃ sthāṇuḥ sa puruṣa itivaditi cenna /
GSP33nysu__2u:17696: tadevaṃ pramāṇasiddhena niravayavatvādinā viśiṣyasyaiva yathā dharmīkaraṇaṃ tathātrāpi
GSP33nysu__2u:17697: sāvarjñādinā pāramārthikenaiva viśiṣyasyaiva dharmīkaraṇamityato dharmigrāhakavirodho duṣparihara iti /
GSP33nysu__2u:17699: yathā khalvabhedapramāṇayoranumānāgamayorupajīvyavirodhānnābhedasādhakatvaṃ tathodāhṛtāyā bhinno 'cintya ityādibhedaśruterapyupajīvyavirodhānna bhedasādhakatvaṃ sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__2u:17701: nacāprāpte tādātmye tatpratiṣedhabodhanaṃ yuktamityabhedaprāpakaṃ pramāṇamupajīvya pravṛttā bhedaśrutiḥ kathaṃ nopajīvyaviruddhā /
GSP33nysu__2u:17702: kiñca nirbhedaṃ svarūpamāśritya tasya bhedo bodhanīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:17723: yadapi nirbhedaṃ svarūpamādāya bhedo boddhavya iti tatrāpi na yayorbhedo bodhanīyastayorabheda āśrayaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:17724: kintu svagatabhedaṃ vastu dharmitayopādāya tasyāntato bhedo bodhyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:17728: iyaṃ khalu śrutiḥ sārvajñādiviśiṣyamīśvaraṃ pratipādayantī na kiñcidapekṣate /

GSP33nysu__2u:17756: vastuvyavahito vahniradhūmasthale pratyakṣādyavedyo 'pi kvaciddeśe pratyakṣeṇānumānena vāvagamyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:17785: yadyapyanumānaṃ svataḥ śrutito durbalaṃ tathāpi upajīvyatayā bādhakaṃ bhavatyeveti / *8,584*
GSP33nysu__2u:17792: duḥkhitvādirūpe hi jīvasya tāttvike sati tathā syānna caivam /
GSP33nysu__2u:17794: antaḥkaraṇagato hi duḥkhādiranarthaḥ svarūpato mithyābhūto japākusumāruṇimeva sphaṭike caitanye cakāsti /
GSP33nysu__2u:17796: bhedakena vastu bhidyata iti ata āha- neti //
GSP33nysu__2u:17797: na duḥkhānubhavaḥ kvāpi mithyānubhavatāṃ vrajet // MAnuv_2,3.58ab //
GSP33nysu__2u:17801: bhavedetadyadyahaṃ duḥkhītyādyanubhavo mithyānubhavaḥ syānna ca tathā /
GSP33nysu__2u:17808: na hi bādhaḥ kvacid dṛṣṭo duḥkhādyanubhavasya tu // MAnuv_2,3.58cd //
GSP33nysu__2u:17812: nahi kadācitkutracitkaścinnāhaṃ duḥkhī kintvantaḥkaraṇagatenaiva mithyāduḥkhena duḥkhitayā'tmānamamani(ṣī)
GSP33nysu__2u:17816: atra hi duḥkhādyupaplavarahitamevāsyātmanastāttvikaṃ rūpamiti pratipādyata ityata āha- yadīti //
GSP33nysu__2u:17818: aduḥkhitāśrutiḥ kena na bhrāntiriti gamyate // MAnuv_2,3.59 //
GSP33nysu__2u:17831: tathāca sati śrutiprāmāṇyaniścaye 'nubhavasya bhrāntitvaṃ tasmiṃśca sati śrutiprāmāṇyaniścaya iti parasparāśrayatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:17836: nanu tarhi nedaṃ rajatamityasyāpi rajatamidamiti jñānaṃ prati bādhakatvamayuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:17838: nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānaprāmāṇyasya sākṣiṇā parīkṣayā niścitatvāt /
GSP33nysu__2u:17845: evaṃ tarhi śruterapi prāmāṇyaṃ parīkṣāsahakṛtena sākṣiṇā niścitamityanubhavabādhakatvamupapatsyata ityāśayavānāśaṅkate- śrutīti // *8,588*
GSP33nysu__2u:17846: evaṃ tarhi śruterapi prāmāṇyaṃ parīkṣāsahakṛtena sākṣiṇā niścitamityanubhavabādhakatvamupapatsyata ityāśayavānāśaṅkate śrutīti / *8,589*
GSP33nysu__2u:17854: taccenmānaṃ gṛhītaṃ te kiṃ duḥkhānubhave bhramaḥ // MAnuv_2,3.60cd //

GSP33nysu__2u:18545: yadyapi caturthapāde 'pi śrutivacanānāṃ parasparavirodha eva parihriyate /
GSP33nysu__2u:18554: tathāpyarthanirṇayāyaiva pādārambho na prāmāṇyanirṇayāyāto na mīmāṃsātvahaniriti darśayitumartha ityuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:18555: yadyapi yuktayaḥ pūrvapāde 'pi santi tathāpyāgamagṛhītavyāptyādimattvenātra prabalā iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__2u:18556: pāramārthike virodhe niṇaryo duṣkara ityata ivetyuktam /
GSP33nysu__2u:18562: yuktisahitaśrutibhiḥ pūrvapakṣite kathaṃ śrutimātreṇa tadviparītārthanirṇaya ityata uktam- suviśiṣyeti //
GSP33nysu__2u:18564: tathā prāṇā ityādīnāṃ sūtrāṇāṃ bhāṣya evārtho vispaṣṭa ityataḥ pūrvottarapa(kṣīyayu)
